T02TD2663A.1E:261a-1: bee ro tsa n'a bhi sam bo dhi tantra sya sad britti n'a ma /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-3: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa'i rgyud kyi tshig 'grel zhes bya ba /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis thog ma thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-5: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes des 'dul ba'i 'gro ba rnam pa gnyis su gzigs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-6: dmigs pa dang bcas pa la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-7: zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-8: 'dul ba'i 'gro ba de rnams la yang spyod pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nas 'jug cing spyod pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-10: sngags kyi sgo nas 'jug cing spyod pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-11: de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nas 'jug cing spyod pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-12: dmigs pa dang bcas pa la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-13: zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-14: de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nas 'jug cing spyod pa'i gdul ba'i 'gro ba dmigs pa dang bcas pa la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa rnams kyi don du 'dul ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-17: de bzhin du gzhan yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde khyim bdag dpa' bo la sogs pa bstan to //
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-18: de bzhin du zab cing rgya che la mos pa'i 'dul ba'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don du zab cing rgya che ba'i mdo sde sdong po bkod pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-19: sa bcu dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po la sogs pa rnams bstan to //
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-20: de bzhin du sngags kyi sgo nas 'jug cing spyod pa'i gdul ba'i 'gro ba rnams la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-21: dmigs pa ngang bcas pa la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-22: zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-23: de la dmigs pa dang bcas pa la mos pa gtso bor gyur pa rnams kyi don du /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-24: 'phags pa legs par grub pa'i rgyud dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-25: rig 'dzin gyi sde snod la sogs pa bya ba'i rgyud rnams bstan to //
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-26: de bzhin du zab cing rgya che bas 'dul ba'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don du 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud la sogs pa bstan te /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-27: dmigs pa dang bcas pa la gtso bor gyur pa zhes pa yang zab cing rgya che ba la ma mos shing mi spyod pa ma yin mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:261a-28: dmigs pa dang bcas pa la spyod par mos pa'i shas che ba la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-0: zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa @261b gtso bor gyur pa rnams la yang dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa ma yin mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-1: zab cing rgya che ba la spyod pa'i shas che ba ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-2: de lta bu yin par ni gsal por 'phags pa de nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa nang gi rnal 'byor gtso bor gyur pa ma yin mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-3: phyi'i spyod pa rnams kyang med pa ma yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-4: de bzhin du bya ba'i rgyud rnams kyang phyi'i spyod pa gtso bor gyur pa yin mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-5: nang gi spyod pa yang med pa ma yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-6: rig 'dzin gyi sde snod la sogs par rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnam pa gsum la gzhol ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-7: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nas 'jug cing spyod pa rnams la yang ji ltar rigs par sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-8: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa'i rgyud 'di yang thabs dang shes rab gtse bor gyur pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud yin mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-9: bya ba la mos pa'i gdul bya'i 'gro ba rnams gzung ba'i phyir bya ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su mthun pa'i spyod pa dag kyang bstan pas bya ba'i rgyud dam /
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-10: gnyis ka'i rgyud lta bur so sor brtags shing grags so //
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-11: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyud 'di yang gdul ba'i 'gro ba rab dang 'bring dang tha ma ste rnam pa gsum gyi don du bstan te /
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-12: mgo smos pas go ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-13: don rnam par phye bas go ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-14: tshig lhur len pa'i gdul ba'i 'gro ba rnams so //
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-15: de la mgo smos pas go ba ni shes rab mchog tu rno zhing thos pa mang ba dang ldan pas rgyud 'di'i mtshan don dang rjes su mthun pa rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan tsam thos pas rgyud 'di'i don thams cad go bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-16: rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rang bzhin du shes so //
T02TD2663A.1E:261b-17: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes pa la mngon par byang chub pa ni rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:262a-0: de yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid du thugs su chung @262a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:262a-2: rnam par sprul pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kyang de ltar mngon bar rdzogs par byang chub pa nyid kyi tshe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:262a-3: sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis chos nyid kyis thob pa lhun gyis grub pa nyid du sku mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis sus kyang zil gyis mi non pa nyid du khams gsum thams cad du khyab pa longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku la sogs pas ji ltar snod du gyur pa'i sems can gang gis 'dul ba'i skus don mdzad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:262a-4: sangs rgyas kyi skus 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi skur ston pa nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la de rnams kyi tshul bstan cing don mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:262a-5: de bzhin du gsung mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis kyang khams gsum thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi gsung dam pas khyab par chos ston pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:262a-6: de bzhin du thugs mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis kyang rnam pa dang bcas pa'i yid las byung ba'i dbang chen dang chu'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rnam par bstan par go ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:262a-7: de bzhin du byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kyang de ltar rnam par sprul pa sku gsung thugs mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis khams gsum thams cad du khyab par bstan pa de ni kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su dag pa rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:262a-8: gdul ba'i 'gro ba 'og ma rnams kyi spyod yul du ma gyur pas /
T02TD2663A.1E:262a-9: sku la sogs pa mi zad pa'i rgyan de nyid gdul ba'i 'gro ba de rnams kyi don du rgyud 'dir dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya'i sgo nas lus ngag yid kyi mtshan mar gyur pa bstan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:262a-10: byin gyis rlob pa zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya'i sgo nas lus ngag yid gsum gyi cha lugs dang rang bzhin du lhag par gzhag ces pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.1E:262a-11: de ltar rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa zhes pa don dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan tsam gyis mgo smos pas go ba'i gdul bya rnams kyis don 'di lta bur go ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:262a-12: de dag gi don du rgyud 'di'i mtshan tsam smos par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:262a-13: de ltar shes pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-1: brjod bar bya ba bstan pa dang dgos pa yang bstan par shes par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-2: rgyud 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sku mi zad pa la sogs pa'i rgyud dang 'brel par blta ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-3: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di ni rgyud 'di'i rgyu yin la rgyud 'di ni de'i 'bras bur shes par bya ste de ni 'brel pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-4: de bzhin du rgyud 'dir dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya'i sgo nas lus dang ngag dang yid ji ltab bzhin du bstan pas rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul ji lta bu yin pa rgyud 'dis mtshon par shes par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-5: de bas na rgyud 'di ni rjod par byed pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni brjod par bya ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-7: de la dgos pa ni rgyud 'dir ji skad du bshad pa'i rim gyis sgrub pa'i spyod pas rang gi lhag pa'i lha mnyes par byas nas lha dang mi'i longs spyod dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-8: ral gri dang rig 'dzin la sogs pa mngon par mtho ba'i mtshan nyid thob pa ni dngos dang brgyud nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mkhyen rab dam pas bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa ni dgos pa de'i yang dgos par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-9: don rnam par phye bas go ba'i gdul ba rnams kyis ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-10: don de dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan tsam smos pas rgyud kyi don shes par mi nus te /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-11: de bas na de dag gi don du rgyud kyi don rnams rnam par phye ste bshad pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyud dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-12: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dang de'i mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu dang rang bzhin dang 'bras bu la sogs pa bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-13: de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyu bshad pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-14: 'jig rten pa'i sems kyi rim pa brgyad la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-15: mos pas spyod pa la sogs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sa'i rim pas kun du sangs rgyas pa'i sa'i bar du ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyu bshad pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-16: rang bzhin bshad pa yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku rnam pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-17: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-18: gang gi phyir rgyud 'dir sprul pa'i sku rnam pa gnyis su brtags nas sku bzhir bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:262b-19: lus dang ngag dang yid mi zad pa'i rgyan rnam par sprul pas khams gsum thams cad khyab pa /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-1: can ma yin pa'i lus la sogs par snod du gyur pa ji ltar snang ba de ni de'i 'bras bu bshad pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-2: mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyu yang rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-3: rtsa ba ni snying rje chen po'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-4: mthar thug pa ni thabs so zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-5: rang bzhin yang de la byang chub gang zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-6: gang rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa ste zhes pa la sogs pa ji skad du gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-7: de bzhin du de'i rnam par sprul pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-8: byin gyis rlob pa dag kyang bshad par bya ste zhib tu ni bsdus pa'i don nyid du bshad pas 'dir ma smos so //
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-9: tshig lhur len pa'i gdul ba'i 'gro ba rnams kyis de ltar rgyu dang rang bzhin dang 'bras bu la sogs pa rnam par phye ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-10: bshad kyang tshig dang don rnams zhib tu mi go ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-11: de bas na de dag gi don du tshig re re nas spros shing rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-12: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob pa zhes pa la sogs pa rgyud 'di'i thog ma nas mjug gi bar du spros te bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-13: de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje chen po rgya che ba la sogs pa rgyud 'di thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bcu gcig bstan pa 'di lta ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-14: spong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-15: gnas phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-17: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-18: mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-19: gzhan gyi don gyi thabs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-20: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-23: byang chub kyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-24: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-25: byang chub kyi rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-26: de la bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'i tshig gis spong ba phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-27: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'i mtshan nyid do//
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-28: gnas phun sum tshogs pa ni yon tan rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-29: de la 'dir gnas phun sum tshogs pa brgyad ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhag par gnas pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263a-31: sra zhing rgya che ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-0: byang chub chen po thugs su chud pa'i gnas phun sum tshogs @263b pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-1: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par 'du ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-2: snga khang gi rtse mo rgya che ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-3: kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-4: dbyibs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-5: gdan phun sum tshogs pa rnams so //
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-6: de la de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob pa zhes pa'i tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhag par gnas pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-7: rdo rje chen po brgya che ba //
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-8: zhes pa'i tshig gis sra zhing rgya che ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-9: chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang zhes pas ni byang chub chen po thugs su chud pa'i gnas phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-11: zhes pas ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'du ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pas rnam par rol pa mtha' dang dbung med cing rtse mo mtho ba zhes pas ni snga khang gi rtse mo rgya che ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-13: rin po che'i rgyal pos shin tu legs par brgyan pa 'byung ba zhes pas ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-14: khang bzangs chen po rin po che'i rgyal po'i zhes pas ni dbyibs phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs zhes pas ni gdan phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-16: de dag ni phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa ste gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-17: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni rdo rje 'dzin nam mkha' dri ma med pa zhes pa nas kun du bzang po dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-19: 'jam dpal dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes pa la sogs pas rig par bya ste de dag gis bskor zhing mdun du byas pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-20: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ni lung dang rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-21: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma dus gsum las 'das par byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-22: sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'i chos ston to zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-23: mthu phun sum tshogs pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i gtso bo rnams kyis ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor gyi sbrul pa thob pa ste skabs der /
T02TD2663A.1E:263b-24: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sogs pa de dag dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-0: gsang ba pa'i bdag po la sogs @264a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-1: pa rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sku mnyam pa nyid bkod pa mi zad pa'i mdzod rnam par bsgyings pa la zhugs so //
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-2: de bzhin du gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid bkod pa mi zad pa'i mdzod rnam par bsgyings pa la zhugs te zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-3: gzhan gyi don gyi thabs phun sum tshogs pa ni skabs de thams cad du yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i phrin las thams cad dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-4: gsung gi phrin las thams cad dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-5: thugs kyi phrin las thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad la kun du gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi tshig dag gis chos ston par mthong ba zhes pa nas de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rab tu sim par bgyid pa lags na zhes bya ba'i bar gyis gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-6: gzhan yang rgyud 'dir bshad pa thams cad kyis ji ltar rigs par bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-7: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-8: de'i byang chub kyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-9: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-10: byang chub kyi rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa'i rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-11: sngar bshad zin pas 'dir ma bshad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-12: de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bcu gcig gis ni rgyu 'di thams cad bsdus par blta'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-13: mdo sde dang rgyud gzhan dag tu 'di skad bdag gis thos pa 'byung la /
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-14: rgyud 'dir ma smos pa ni ston pa dang dus dang gnas des pa dang nyan pa dang sdud par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-15: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rtogs pa gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir 'di skad bdag gis thos pa ma smos te /
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-16: rgyud 'di bshad pa yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mngon par byang chub pa'i sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub kyi snying por rtag tu bzhugs pas bshad de /
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-17: dus dang gnas de nyid na nges par bzhugs pas dus gcig gi tshe zhes pa ma smos so //
T02TD2663A.1E:264a-18: nyan pa po yang kun du bzang po la sogs pa de rnams thos pa snying por gyur pa ma yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-0: rtogs pa gtso @264b bor gyur pas 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes ma smos so //
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-1: mdo sde dang gzhung gzhan dag tu smos pa ni bcom ldan 'das longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dus dang gnas ma nges pa na yang bzhugs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-2: bar bar ni 'og min gyi gnas na bzhugs shing chos 'chad /
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-3: res 'ga' ni ri rab kyi rtse mo na bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-4: de bzhin du sprul pa yang res 'ga' ni rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs res 'ga' ni mnyan du yod pa la sogs pa'i gnas na bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa de de ltar gnas dang dus ma nges pas dus gcig gi tshe na zhes smos la /
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-5: nyan pa po yang 'phags pa nyan thos la sogs pa thos pa snying por gyur pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-6: rtogs pa gtso bor gyur pa ma yin pas na 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes ma smos so //
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-7: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bcu gcig kyang rnam pa bzhir bsdus te /
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-9: skyes bu dang gnas dang 'khor dang dgos pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-10: de la bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags yan chad dpyis phyin par shes rab kyis bshig ste med par byas pa ni bcom pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-11: gnyis su na bdud rnams bcom pa la yang bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-12: mdor na nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa yang mngon par byang chub pa'i sku la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-13: des ni skyes bu'i che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-14: skyes bu'i che ba bstan pa de yang chos nyan pa'i sems can chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-15: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnam pa gnyis las chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ni 'chad pa'i skyes bu la mi rtog par chos bzang ngan rtog pas der zad la /
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-16: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ni 'chad pa'i skyes bu btsan pas de 'di la yid ches pa'i phyir dgos pa'i dgos par gyur pa'i skyes bu btsan pa de bstan to //
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-17: gnas phun sum tshogs pa yang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i 'gro ba gzung ba'i phyir te /
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-18: gnas de lta bu na bzhugs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba'am btsun pa bstan pas so //
T02TD2663A.1E:264b-19: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang gcig pur mi bzhugs kyi 'khor de lta bus bskor cing bzhugs so zhes pas bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba'am btsun par bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-2: dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i 'gro ba dogs pa med par skyes bu de lta bu la mnyam par spro bas dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sems can gzung pa'i phyir bstan to //
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-3: gnas bshad pa yang rnam pa gsum gyi phyir te skyes bu btsan pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-4: gnas de lta bu'i yon tan sgrub pa pos rjes su dran par byas na 'grub pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas bcags pa'i gnas de mchod rten du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-6: skyes bu btsan pa ni gong du bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-7: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-8: skyes bu btsan pa dang de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nam mkha' dri ma med pa la sogs pa chos nyan pa dang 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-9: nyan pa'i mchog de dag bzhugs pas sdud par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang du gyur par bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-10: skyes bu ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-11: dgos pa ni rgyud 'dir rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-12: rang bzhin dbang chen dang chu la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-13: las bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin du bsgrubs nas mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i bde ba thob par dgongs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-14: de ltar phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa bcu gcig po bzhi po 'dir bsdus so //
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-15: de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob pa zhes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub kyi snying po na gnas pa la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-16: byin gyis rlob pa zhes pa'i tshig ni gnas pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-17: skabs 'dir byang chub kyi snying po na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pas sangs rgyas mang po gnas par 'gyur ba'i dogs pa bsal ba la sogs pa ni bsdus pa'i don nyid du zhib tu bshad pas 'dir ma smos so //
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-18: rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje de nyid phal pa ma yin gyi mchog gam dam pa la chen po zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-19: rgya che ba ni rdo rje dang ldan pa'i khang pa de ni yangs shing rgya che ba'am rdo rje de dag nyid grangs mang ba la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-20: chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang zhes bya ba ni de la chos ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched do //
T02TD2663A.1E:265a-21: dbyings ni rang bzhin te phung po la sogs pa'i chos kun rdzob pa'i mtshan nyid rigs pas brtag mi bzod pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-0: @265b stong pa nyid ni de dag gi rang bzhin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-1: stong pa'i rang bzhin khong du chud pa ni pho brang ngam 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-2: rdo rje 'dzin thams cad 'du ba zhes pa de la rdo rje ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i lta ba 'joms pa'i shes rab ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-3: shes rab de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-4: 'du ba'i tshig ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa'i skabs su bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-5: rdo rje 'dzin ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang der mi 'du ba ni ma yin mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-6: 'dir sngags bshad pa'i skabs yin pas rdo rje 'dzin pa gtso bor smos so //
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-7: rdo rje 'dzin pa yang rnam pa gsum gyi phyir 'dzin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-8: so so'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo ston pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-9: rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang mchod pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-10: pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya autpala dang padmo la sogs pa 'dzin pa yang so so'i rnam par thar pa'i ston par rig par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pas rnam par rol pa zhes pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na de lta bu'i gnas la sogs par mos shing smon pa las ji ltar smon pa bzhin du thob nas spyod pa ni rol ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-12: mtha' dang dbung med cing rtse mo mtho ba zhes pa ni mtha' gnyis dmigs su med pas na dbus kyang dmigs su med pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-13: rtse mo mtho ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gtsug tor dang 'dra ste rtse mo ltar mi snang ba la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-14: rin po che'i rgyal pos shin tu legs par brgyan pa 'byung ba zhes pa ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa ste snga khang de nyid rin po ches spras pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-15: khang bzangs chen po rin po che'i rgyal po'i nang na zhes pa ni dbyibs bshad pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs zhes pa ni sngon gyi smon lam gyis seng ge'i lus su gyur cing seng ge'i khri byed pa'am /
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i lus nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan du byed de seng ge'i bya ba byed pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:265b-18: bcom ldan 'das gnas de lta bu na bzhugs pa yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin nam mkha' 'dri ma med pa la sogs pa 'di rnams dang bzhugs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang don dang rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan can sha stag gzhung las 'byung bas bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas pa la chos 'chad @266a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma dus gsum las 'das par byin gyis brlabs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'i chos ston to zhes pa chos kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-4: rtogs pa'i chos dang lung gi chos so //
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-5: de la rtogs pa'i chos kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-6: don dam pa dang kun rdzob pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-7: don dam pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-8: kun rdzob kyi chos ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs mi zad pa'i rgyan gyis khams gsum khyab par ston pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-9: lung gi chos ni mdo sde dang tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pa gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis so //
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-10: de rnams las gang bshad ce na /
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-11: skabs 'dir lung gi chos rgyud 'di nyid bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-13: sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'i chos ston to zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-14: de la sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid ces pa mnyam pa gsum gyis rig par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor los sems can gyi lus dang ngag dang yid ji snyed pa de snyed du khyab pas mnyam pa nyid do //
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-16: gnyis su na bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor los sems can gyi don du sbyor ba na /
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i 'khor los gsung dang thugs kyi bya ba yang byed /
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-18: gsung gi 'khor los kyang sku dang thugs kyi bya ba yang byed /
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-19: thugs kyi 'khor los kyang sku dang gsung gi bya ba yang byed de /
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-20: de ltar mtshungs par byed pas na mnyam pa nyid do //
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-21: gsum du na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la sogs pa dang ;
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-22: sems can gyi lus dang ngag dang yid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du dbyer med cing ro gcig pas na mnyam pa nyid do //
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-23: chos kyi sgo zhes pa ni de lta bu'i sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi de bshad pas rtogs pa'i chos la 'jug par gyur pa'i sgo yin pas sgo zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-24: de bzhin du lung gi chos gzhan rnams kyang rtogs pa'i chos la 'jug pa'i sgo lta bur rig par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-25: de la chos 'chad pa yang sku bzhi gang gis 'chad ce na /
T02TD2663A.1E:266a-26: chos kyi sku dang byang chub kyi snying po na bzhugs pa'i sku ni mi g-yo ba nyid tshig tu brjod pa las 'das pas na tshig gis chos mi 'chad de /
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-0: de'i byin rlabs kyis longs spyod rdzogs pa @266b dang sprul pa'i skus 'chad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-1: de la skabs 'dir yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo 'chad de /
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma dus gsum las 'das par byin gyis brlabs nas 'chad de /
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-4: chos kyi sku de nyi ma lta bur snang ba'i rang bzhin yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma zhes bya la /
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-5: chos kyi sku nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa'i dus las 'das te /
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-6: de bas na dus gsum las 'das pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-7: dus gsum las 'das pa ni 'das pa'i dus dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-8: da ltar gyi dus dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus las 'das pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-9: de dag gis ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-10: mthu phun sum tshogs pa bshad pa ni gzhung las de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sogs pa de dag dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-11: gsang ba pa'i bdag po la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin de dag ces pa nas gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi tshig rnam par dag pa'i tshig dag gis chos ston pa dag kyang mthong ngo zhes pa'i bar du 'byung ba ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-12: de la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sku mnyam pa nyid bkod pa mi zad pa'i mdzod rnam par bsgyings pa la zhugs so zhes pa de la kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sa bcu la sogs pa rab tu thob pa na rang gi ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas mthu dang rdzu 'phrul 'byin pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par brgyan pa la sogs pa byas pas mgu zhing de las gzhan pa'i bya ba med do snyam pa'i blo skye ba la /
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-14: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dpal be'u'i 'od mchog bkye bas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi gtsug tu phog ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-15: de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de rnams bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid bkod pa mi zad pa'i mdzod rnam par bsgyings pa la zhugs so //
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-16: de bzhin du gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid bkod pa mi zad pa'i mdzod rnam par bsgyings pa la yang zhugs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-17: de la mnyam pa nyid ni gong du bshad pa rnam pa gsum mo //
T02TD2663A.1E:266b-18: bkod pa ni skabs 'dir rnam pa sna tshogs su blta'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-0: mi zad pa ni chos kyi sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sku la sogs pa de dag nam 'khor ba yod @267a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-2: mdzod ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku de nyid la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-3: sku de las ji ltar 'dul ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo zad mi shes pa 'byung ba'i phyir la /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-4: sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo de dag nyid sus kyang zil gyis mi non par rang gi bya ba la 'jug pas ni rnam par bsgyings pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-5: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'am gsung ngam thugs la ni 'jug pa'am ldog pa yang mi dmigs so zhes pa la 'ga' zhig rtog pa skye ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-6: gdul bya'i 'gro ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-7: shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dar la tsam gyis bsgribs pa'i lhag ma lus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-8: mos pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa'i sa mngon du byas pa rnams dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-9: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs la /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-10: shes bya'i sgrib pa ma spangs pa phyogs gcig pa rnams dang ;
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-11: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa ma spangs pa'i 'gro ba sna tshogs pa rnams so //
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-12: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la 'jug pa dang ldog pa mi dmigs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-13: rnam par mi rtog na yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul du 'gyur gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-14: 'og ma rnams kyi spyod yul du 'gyur ram mi 'gyur snyam du dogs pa skyen /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-15: de'i lan ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa nyid kyi tshe na rnam par mi rtog par sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-16: chos nyid kyi lhun gyis grub pa nyid du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul pa'i skus ji ltar snod du gyur pa'i sems can gyi don thams cad du mdzad de /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-17: de bas na gzhung las thams cad du yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i phrin las thams cad dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-18: gsung gi phrin las thams cad dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-19: thugs kyi phrin las thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad la kun du gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi tshig 'di dag gis chos ston par mthong zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-20: de la mthong ba ni byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:267a-21: de yang rnam pa thams cad du mthong ba ni ma yin mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-0: rang gi mthu dang spyod yul shas che chung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo mthong ba'am rtogs pa @267b la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-1: rnam pa thams cad du rtogs shing mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa dang bye brag med par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-2: des na 'phags pa kun du bzang po la sogs pa de rnams nyid bshad pa'i chos su 'jug pa'i zhar la sngags rgyud dang rtog pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid rnams la zhugs nas bshad pa'i chos kyi rim par bsdu bar mdzad pas ji ltar rjes su rtogs pa de bstan par yang gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-3: thams cad du yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i phrin las thams cad dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-4: gsung gi phrin las thams cad dang thugs kyi phrin las thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad la kun du gsang sngags bshad par bya ba ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-5: thams cad du zhes pa la dus zhes khong nas dbyung ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-6: des na tshig gi don ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-7: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa'i dus dbang byang chub thob pa'i dus su shes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-8: de ci 'dra ba zhig gis she na /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-9: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i phrin las thams cad dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-10: gsung gi phrin las thams cad dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-11: thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ces gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-12: de la 'dir sku'i phrin las la sogs pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-13: de bzhin du byang chub thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bya ba ste nan tan no //
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-14: des bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes la mthu'i khyad par bsags pa gang yin pa de la phrin las zhes brjod do //
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-15: de lta bu'i mthu'i mtshan nyid las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs su gyur pa'i spyod pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-16: sems can gyi khams thams cad la kun du gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi tshig dag gis chos ston par mthong zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-17: de la sems can gyi khams thams cad la zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-18: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams na 'gro ba rigs drug tu gtogs pa'i sems can las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis tshe thob pa rnams la zhes dgongs so //
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-19: kun du zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-20: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi tshig dag gis chos ston pa zhes pa de la shes pa dang skyob par ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sngags su gsungs la /
T02TD2663A.1E:267b-21: de dag gi rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa'i tshig rnams dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-1: gyis brlab pa'i yi ge dang tshig rnams kyang sngags kyi tshig tu gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-2: sngags de rnams kyi rgyu dang rang bzhin dang 'bras bu thob pa'i thabs lam ni tshul te /
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-3: de go zhing rtogs par byed pa'i chos kyi tshig go //
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-4: de nyid la sngags kyi tshig ces kyang gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi phrin las sngags la sogs pa'i lhar snang bar gyur pa de rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa'i chos ston par kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis mthong ngo zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-6: 'dis ni don rnam pa gsum gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la sogs pa'i phrin las rnams kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gzugs su gyur pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-8: de yang ji ltar snod du gyur pa'i gdul bya'i 'gro ba 'dul nus pas rjes su mthun pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-9: de ston pa'i chos sngags kyi tshig tu'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-10: don 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud 'dir gzhung 'di gsal bar bstan te /
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi rang gi sku la sogs pa las kyi lha'i gzugs su gyur pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i thogs pa med pa'i stobs bcu'i mos pa las du ma'i kha dog dang dbyibs su bkod pa'i bdag gi ngo bo bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-16: bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsod nams las grub pa'i lus 'byung ngo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-17: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la sogs pa'i las rnams lha la sogs pa'i gzugs su gyur pa de ni ci yang rung ba ma yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-18: sems can 'dul nus par snang ba'i rang bzhin kho na ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-20: bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe /
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-21: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa nges par 'byung bar byed pa'i sgo spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin las dang tshe dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu za ba dang zar 'jug pa'i gzugs dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268a-26: spyod pa dang nges pa'i tshig brjod pa sems can thams cad so so so sor yang dag par mgu bar byed pa chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par bskyed pa'i sku rnams byung bar gyur to //
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-0: byung nas kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi @268b khams rab 'byam rnams su sgra dbyangs gcig gis chos kyi dbyings khyab par rnam par rig par byed pa /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di sgrogs par gyur to zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-2: de bzhin du de dag gis bshad pa'i tshig sngags la sogs par bya ba'i phyir dang ;
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-3: der byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-4: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsang sngags kyi tshul yig 'bru dag tu byin gyis brlab ce na /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-5: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar yang dag par bsgrub pa'i bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-7: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-8: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-10: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-11: byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che bdun dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-12: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad gang ngag yin pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-14: gsang ba pa'i bdag po mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyid bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-15: sngon gyi smon lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-16: chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs nas sems can rnams la skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags kyi cho ga yang dag par rab tu ston to zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-17: de la chos kyi sku rtog pa thams cad rab tu med par gnas pa las ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa de lta bu'i sngags kyi lha tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur zhes 'ga' zhig smra na de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-18: lus kyi bye brag ji snyed pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-19: brjod pa las ni mang du 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-20: de bzhin sngags kyi mgon po ye //
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-21: bye brag dag kyang grangs med gsungs //
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-22: ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-23: dpal ldan 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-24: de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yi //
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-25: sku yang don rnams thams cad sgrub //
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-26: gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa ji ltar dgos pa thams cad mngon par sgrub ce na /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-27: gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di lta ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-28: dper na nam mkha'i khams ni sems can yang ma yin /
T02TD2663A.1E:268b-30: shed las skyes pa yang ma yin /
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-2: tshor ba po yang ma yin /
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-4: 'dzin pa yang ma yin zhing rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-5: 'on kyang sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnam par 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa thams cad byed de /
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-6: 'di la ni dogs pa med do //
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-7: de bzhin rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa gnas med 'di //
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-9: 'gro ba rnams kyi phyi dang nang //
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-10: thams cad nges pa nyid du sgrub //
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-12: gsung 'di la yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa 'di lta bu yin par khong du chud de /
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku la rnam par gnas pa la rnam par rtog pa med kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis lha'i lus la sogs pa thams cad du rab tu snang na /
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-14: de la rnam par rtog pa'i go skabs ga la yod ces so //
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-15: sems can las kyi tshe rnam par bskyed pa rnams zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-16: rnam par dag pa'i tshig dag gis chos ston pa dag kyang mthong ngo zhes pa'i bar bshad par bya ste ;
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-17: de la rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-19: phyag na padmo'i lus dang 'dra ba zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i byin gyi rlabs sems can las kyi tshe bskyed pa rnams dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-20: las kyi tshe bkag ba rnams yang srid pa'i myu gu mngon par bskyed pa'i phyir chos 'chad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-21: de la las kyis rnam par bskyed pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-22: mos pas spyod pa'i sa gnas pa na sems gsum sbyong ba dang sa bcu la sogs pa'i yon tan ji lta bu yin pa de nges par shes shing de la mos pas nyon mongs pa kun nas mi ldang bar rnam par mnan te /
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-23: sems sbyang ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis ji ltar smon pa bzhin du brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa gang 'dod par skye ba ni las kyi tshe rnam par skyed pa yin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-24: de yang sems dang po bskyed pa nas sa bcu pa'i bar du'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-25: de la sems dang po bskyed pa ni sa dang po rab tu dga' ba la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-26: las kyi tshe bkag pa ni 'phags pa nyan thos nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa rnams phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe /
T02TD2663A.1E:269a-27: padmo dam pa'i snying po la bskal pa brgyad cur gnas nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-0: tshe 'gog par byed pa de la byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi tshe 'gog pa de las @269b bzlog ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-1: yang srid pa'i myu gu bskyed nas sa bcu la 'jug pa dang rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos 'chad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-2: 'di nyid la yongs su rdzogs par bya ba zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-3: sngags kyi tshig rnam par dag pa 'di nyid kyis zhes bya bar dgongs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-4: sngags kyi tshig rnam par dag pa zhes pa ni phyag na padmo dang phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i sras su gyur pa'i sems can rnams dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-5: las kyi tshe bkag pa'i sems can rnams ni sems can phal ba bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i dbang du mi 'gro la /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-6: de rnams la chos bshad pa yang sa dang po nas brtsams nas sa bcu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rnam par dkar ba'i chos sha stag yin pas sngags kyi tshig rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-8: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje 'khor 'dus pa de nyid na 'dug pas /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-9: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-10: bcom ldan 'das ye shes 'di'i rgyu ni gang /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-12: mthar thug pa ni gang lags zhes pa'i bar du 'byung ba la /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las las byung ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de sems can rnams la rnam par phye ste tshul sna tshogs dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-14: thabs sna tshogs kyis bshad pa de dag ji ltar mthong ba bcom ldan 'das la slar bzlas nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de'i rgyu dang rtsa ba dang mthar thug pa dris pa yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-15: ji ltar zhes pa dang 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshig rnams ni dri ba ma yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-16: de rnams bdag gis ji ltar rtogs pa rnams gsol nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-17: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu dang rtsa ba dang mthar thug pa dri ba'i spyir smos pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-18: de la bcom ldan 'das dang de bzhin gshegs pa ni gong du bshad la /
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-19: dgra bcom pa ni nyon mongs pa'i dgra bcom pa'am mchod par 'os pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas zhes pa ni snying po byang chub na yang dag par bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:269b-21: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-0: kun rdzob ni stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bco brgyad la sogs @270a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-1: pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-2: don dam pa ni stong pa nyid du mkhyen pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-3: rnam par phye ste zhes pa ni so sor bshags pa'i don te thams cad mkhyen par ro gcig tu gyur cing rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'og nas 'chad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-4: mi dang lhar skye ba la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i dge ba bcu grub pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-5: nyan thos la sogs pa thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i cha'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-7: 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyang thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ba'i brgyud pa'i rgyu ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa'i cha shas yod pas na rgyur 'gyur la /
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-9: gzhan yang dngos dang brgyud pa nas brgyud pa'i rang bzhin yin par rig par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bsags pa de lhun gyis grub pa nyid du sems can rnams la rnam par phye ba ni tshul la sogs pa sna tshogs su bstan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-11: de la tshul sna tshogs zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-12: kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i tshul zhes pa nas mngon par shes pa lnga'i tshul gyi bar te /
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-13: de rnams so so'i rnam par grol ba'i lam la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-14: bsam pa sna tshogs shes pa ni kha cig la ni ltar skye bar bya ba zhes pa nas mi'am ci'i bar du skye bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston zhes pa'i bar te /
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-15: de rnams su skye bar 'dod pa'i bsam pa dang rjes su mthun par chos 'chad pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-16: thabs sna tshogs kyi tshul gyis chos ston zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-17: de la sems can la la sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su mthong zhes pa nas spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs su bzhugs par mthong la zhes pa'i bar te /
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-18: tshul sna tshogs dang bsam pa sna tshogs 'chad pa yang thabs yin mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-19: de dag nyid sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i skus sems can de dag gi rang rang gi skad kyi tshul du smra zhing /
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-20: so so'i spyod lam du rnam par gnas par ston pas na thabs kyi yang thabs su blta'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-21: spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs su zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dang nyan thos la sogs pas 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gi spyod lam dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs su 'gyur zhing ston pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:270a-22: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de yang 'di ltar /
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol @270b ba'i ror ro gcig pa legs so zhes pa ni de ltar tshul sna tshogs dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-1: bsam pa dang thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rnam pa tha dad pa du mar spros pa yang thun mong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs pa /
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-2: rtog pa'i bag chags kyi gnas las shin tu 'das pa'i mtshan nyid du ro gcig tu 'gyur ba ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-3: dper na bu ram shing rnam pa mang po'i khu ba las bu ram du byas na bu ram shing de rnams kyi so so'i ror dbyer med de ro gcig pa dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na /
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-5: nam mkha'i khams ni rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba ste zhes pa nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rab tu sim par bgyid pa lags zhes pa'i bar gyi ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de'i rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa dang mngon par mtho ba'i gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang spong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-6: nges par legs pa thob pa'i gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa thob par dpe dag gis bstan te /
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-7: dpe dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis lhun gyis grub pa nyid du rnam par mi rtog mi dpyod par tshul sna tshogs la sogs pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi don byed par yang bstan to //
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-8: de la nam mkha'i dpes ni rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-9: nam mkha' ji ltar rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i bag chags kyi gnas med pa de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de la rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa med de /
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-10: rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa med ces pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-11: de la de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par mi rtog cing sems pa med pa yin na /
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-12: sems pa med par ji ltar lus la sogs pa'i rgyun 'byung zhing sems can gyi don byed snyam du dogs pa la sa'i dpes rnam par mi rtog bzhin du mngon par mtho ba'i gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa byed par bstan te /
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-13: de la sa ni rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa med bzhin du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-14: me tog la sogs pas sems can thams cad kyi gsos su 'gyur bar byed do //
T02TD2663A.1E:270b-15: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de yang rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa med bzhin du sngags kyi lha la sogs pa'i sgor ston te /
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-0: sems can rnams kyis kyang sngags kyi lha @271a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-1: la sogs pa bsnyen cing ba zlas pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas mnyes par byas pas mngon par mtho ba'i mtshan nyid mi dang lha'i longs spyod la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-2: me'i dpes ni spong ba phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-3: ji ltar mes rtsi shing la sogs pa thams cad bsregs kyang sreg par 'gyur ba'i mthu mi zad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-4: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de yang mi shes pa'i bud shing thams cad sreg ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-5: rgyu'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis mi shes pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams sel zhing med par byed pa ni bud shing sreg pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-6: gnyis su na 'bras bu'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas na mi shes pa'i bud shing sreg pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-7: des gong ma'i spong ba phun sum tshogs pa de nyid kyang des bag chags thams cad ma lus par spong ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-8: zhes rlung gi dpe 'og mas bstan te /
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-9: de bas na rlung gi khams ni rdul thams cad sel bar bgyid pa lags so zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-10: de la rdul ni phra ba'i mtshan nyid de /
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-11: de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis mi shes pa'i bag chags phra mo'i mthar thug pa spangs pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-12: chu'i dpes ni nges par legs pa'i gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan te /
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-13: ji ltar chu des tsha ba la sogs pas gdungs pa'i sems can gyi lus sim par byed pa de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de yang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-14: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gdungs pa zhi bar byed pa nges par legs pa'i mtshan nyid mya ngan las 'das pa la sbyor zhing rdzogs par byed pas na /
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-15: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rab tu sim par bgyid pa lags zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-16: de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul sngon chad bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa las /
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-17: phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid kyis 'di ltar rtogs so zhes gsol ba ste bdag nyid kyis rtogs par bstan pa yang chos gsung ba po spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-18: de dag gi rang bzhin de ltar rtogs mod kyi de dag gi rgyu gtso bo'i rgyu dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:271a-19: rgyu'i rgyu dang mthar phyin par byed pa'i rgyu gang lags zhes dris pa ni 'di'i rgyu ni gang /
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-0: mthar @271b thug pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-1: de la 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes tshul sna tshogs la sogs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ror ro gcig par rtogs pa de ci rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis sam /
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-2: thos pa'i shes rab kyis shes /
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-3: gal te rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis shes na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang khyad par med la /
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-4: thos pa'i shes rab kyis shes na yang sems can tha mal pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro snyam du dogs na /
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-5: lan ni shes rab de gnyi gas shes pa la nyes pa med de /
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mi zad pa'i rgyan la sogs pa la 'jug pa na rang gi mthu dang 'tsham pa'i spyod yul gyis shes kyi ;
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-7: bcom ldan 'das ltar rnam pa thams cad du shes pa ni ma yin pas khyad par med par mi 'gyur la thos pa yang rtogs pa gtso bor gyur pa yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-8: sems can tha mal pa ltar thos pa tsam gtso bor gyur pa ma yin pas sems can tha mal pa dang khyad par med par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-9: gnyis su na rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad du shes na yang nyes pa med de bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pha rol gyi sems shes pa bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam pa thams cad du shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-10: de la bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de'i rgyu dang rtsa ba dang mthar thug pa dris pa la legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig lan gsum gsungs pa las snga ma ni don bzang po dris pas mnyes shing bstod pa'i tshig yin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-11: gnyis pa ni dri ba'i tshig de nyid legs pa la bya zhing /
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-12: tha ma gcig ni phyag na rdo rje la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-13: de lta bu'i don bzang po 'dri zhing sems can la phan gdags pa'i phyir dris pa legs so zhes gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-14: shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig ces bya bas ni snod bzhi las bzlog par gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-15: nyon cig ces pa ni snod kha sbub pa las bzlog pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-16: legs par zhes pa ni snod glo rdol can las bzlog pa'o ;
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-17: / shin tu zhes pa ni snod mi gtsang ba las bzlog pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-18: yid la zung shig ces pas ni snod zhabs rdol las bzlog pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-19: rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-20: rtsa ba ni snying rje chen po'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:271b-21: mthar thug pa ni thabs so zhes pa de la byang chub kyi sems la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-2: byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyi sems so //
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-3: byang chub kyi phyir sems pa ni smon pa dang 'jug pa'i sems dag kyang yin mod kyi skabs 'dir dang po'i byang chub kyi sems la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-4: sa dang po'i sems de mngon par byang chub pa'i snying por sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-5: byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyi sems kyang 'di lta ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-6: sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems de ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pas mngon par byang chub pa'i sems dang rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-7: de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu'i gtso bor rig par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-8: snying rje ni rtsa ba ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-9: sems can sdug bsngal bas gdungs pa las bral ba'i phyir snying rje'i sgo nas smon lam la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-10: de bas na snying rje de byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa bar gyur pas na rgyu'i yang rgyur blta'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-11: gnyis su na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstan par gnas par byed pa'i phyir rtsa ba zhes bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-12: thugs rje'i gzungs kyis lhag ma lus pa'i mya ngan las mi 'da' bar dus thams cad du mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par gnas shing kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i ye shes brten pa ste sdong po'i rtsa ba ltar brten par byed pas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rtsa ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-13: mthar thug pa ni thabs so zhes pa la /
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-14: thabs ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-15: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rdzogs par sbyor ba'i mthar thug par de dag gis ston pas na mthar thug par blta'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-16: de la thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu byang chub kyi sems so zhes bya na /
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-17: byang chub nyid gang yin mi shes pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-18: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub gang zhe na zhes bya ba nas 'di lta ste nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-19: gong du byang chub kyi sems thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyur bshad pa de'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin bshad pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-20: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub gang zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:272a-21: gang gi rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa ste zhes pa la gang zhe na zhes pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang theg pa chen po'i byang chub rnams las gang yin zhes pa la mi bya'i byang chub de ci 'dra ba yin zhes pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-0: rang gi sems yang dag pa ji @272b lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis bum pa la sogs pa'i rnam par mthong ba de sems kyi skad cig ma phyi mas bum pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa de yang dag pa ma yin par sun phyung nas de ltar gzung ba'i cha sun phyung ste med na 'dzin pa'i cha yang yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-1: de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba yongs su dag pa rnam pa med pa rang bzhin gyis dag par shes pa ni rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-2: de bzhin du gzhung gzhan las kyang /
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-3: ye shes bzhi las mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni byang chub tu bshad /
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-4: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang so sor rtog pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-5: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bshad par rig par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-6: de la yang bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub po zhes pa la bla na med pa ni byang chub de'i gong na de las lhag pa'i byang chub gzhan med pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-7: yang dag par byang chub pa ni phyin ci ma log par byang chub pa la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-8: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs kyang shes bya'i sgrib pa ma spangs pas phyogs gcig phyin ci log pa ni ma yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-9: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis ka spangs pas yang dag par byang chub pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-10: rdzogs par byang chub pa ni kun tu byang chub pa zhes bya ste shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i bag chags kyi mthar thug pa ma lus par spangs pas na kun du byang chub pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-11: gnyis su na rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i chos rnams rnam pa thams cad du stong par shes pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-12: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la chos ni rdul tsam yang med cing mi dmigs so zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-13: byang chub de la phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-14: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin bag chags tsam yang med pas byang chub de nyid 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du med cing dmigs su med do zhes pa ni dmigs pa'i yul ma yin pas gzung ba'i rang bzhin yang med do //
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-16: byang chub de ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-17: zhes pa ni de la nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni rtag pa dang mi 'gyur ba dang stong pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang yin mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:272b-18: skabs 'dir gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rang bzhin med pa la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-1: na de bstan pa'i phyir de la byang chub par byed pa yang med la /
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-2: byang chub par bya ba 'ga' yang med do zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-3: byang chub par byed pa ni 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-4: byang chub bar bya ba ni gzung ba ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-5: byang chub de la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gang yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-7: byang chub la mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir te zhes pa ni byang chub de sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-8: chos thams cad kyang mtshan nyid med ces pa la sogs pa la sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de byang chub po zhes bshad na /
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-9: sems las gzhan pa'i chos de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-10: ji ltar sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes shing mtshan nyid med pa la sogs par bshad pa bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mtshan nyid med de nam mkha' bzhin zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-11: yang na chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de nyid byang chub mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bshad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-12: de la chos ni sems las gzhan pa'i phung po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-13: 'di lta ste nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do zhes pa ni nam mkha' la mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-15: bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gang nas yongs su btsal bar bgyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-16: gang gis ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bgyi lags zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-17: gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo chos snang ba'i tshul dang po ste zhes pa'i bar du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-18: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa'i thabs dris pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-19: de gnyis rang gi sems las btsal ba'i thabs bstan pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-20: de la thams cad mkhyen pa gang nas btsal ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:273a-21: gang gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhes pa ni de la ji ltar 'jug ces dris pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-0: byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang gi sems las yongs su btsal bar bya'o zhes pa ni nam rang gi sems @273b nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gyi rnam par rtog pa 'phro ba'i bag chags spangs te rnam par dag pa na /
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-1: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba so so rang gis rig pa mi g-yo ba ye shes kyi snang ba'i mtshan nyid byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-2: sems la ji ltar brtags pas don de shes par 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-3: de la rtog pa'i gang zag kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-4: dbang po las 'das pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-5: 'og ma'i lta ba can 'gro ba tha dad pa rnams so //
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-6: de la 'gro ba tha dad pas brtags pa ni de'i nang na yang med phyi rol na yang med gnyis ka'i bar na yang mi dmigs so zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-9: bar ni de gnyis ka'i bar de na yang sems mi dmigs so zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-10: dbang po las 'das pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang sems kha dog dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-14: gnas pa ste rnam pa lnga'i dngos por mi dmigs te de bas na sngon por ma yin zhes pa nas lus la ma yin yid la mi gnas so zhes pa'i bar du gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-15: ma gzigs zhes pa ni 'das pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-16: mi dmigs zhes pa ni da ltar gyi dus na yang ma gzigs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-17: gzigs par mi 'gyur zhes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang gzigs par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-18: sngon por ma yin zhes pa nas shel gyi kha dog tu ma yin zhes pa'i bar du ni sems de kha dog gi rnam par mthong ba'i yul ma yin pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-19: thung ngur ma yin zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-20: skyes par ma yin ma ning du ma yin no zhes pa'i bar du dbyibs kyi rnam par mthong ba ma yin pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-21: 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin /
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-22: gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin /
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-23: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin zhes pa ni khams kyi rnam par mthong ba med pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-24: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-25: sems can ris mthun pa'i rang bzhin yang ma yin no zhes pa'i bar du rgyud kyi mthong ba med pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:273b-26: sems de ni mig la mi gnas zhes pa nas yid la mi gnas so zhes pa'i bar du dbang po drug la sems gnas par mthong ba med pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-0: kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa de rnams kyi rnam par snang ba na sems de gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i @274a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-1: rang bzhin dang ma bral bas dri ma dang bcas pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-2: de ltar dri ma dang bcas pas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-3: de bas na dri ma de dag thams cad yongs su dag pa'i sems de ni thams cad mkhyen pa ste de'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-5: sems de ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-6: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa spangs pa ste nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de dang 'dra bas na /
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-7: de'i phyir rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-8: rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa spangs pa zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-9: de ltar na sems ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang 'dra ba'i phyir byang chub kyang de nyid yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-10: nam mkha'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni sems kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-11: sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-12: de ltar sems dang byang chub rnams gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gnyis su med de /
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-13: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na sems dang nam mkha'i dbyings dang byang chub 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-14: de yang snying rje'i rtsa ba can thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gzung ba ste zhes pa ni de lta bu'i sems kyi rang bzhin gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i bag chags kyang med pa /
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-15: byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid de'i rtsa ba ni snying rje ste brtan par byed pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-16: de la sbyor bar byed pa'i thabs ni pha rol tu phyin pa ste yongs su gzung ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de skyong ba'i rgyur shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-17: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang zhes pa nas rig par bya'o zhes pa'i bar ni gong du byang chub gang zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-18: gang rang gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'o zhes pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-19: byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang gi sems las yongs su btsal bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-20: sems de ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa yin te zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa de rnam grangs gcig ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:274a-21: gnyis ka yang byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu ston pa'i tshig gi rnam grangs su rig par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-0: / @274b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtogs pa'i chos dang lung gi chos byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la gang dang gang bshad pa rnams ni tshig la sogs pa'i sgo tha dad kyang byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-1: rang gi sems yongs su shes par bya ba'i don rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir te gzhan gyi phyir du ni ma yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-2: de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang du chos gang dang gang ston pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems yongs su dag par bya ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-3: sems yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir yin par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-4: de la byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po thob pa'i byang chub kyi sems de gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir dag pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-5: sems yongs su shes pa ni gang sems kyi ngo bo shes pa de'i rgyus sa dang po thob par byed pa mos pas spyod pa'i dus kyi sems bskyed pa de la bya ste de dag gi phyir chos bshad ces pa'i don te /
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-6: byang chub kyi sems nyid la sbyor bar byed pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-7: de ltar sems yongs su gzung bar bya ba yang kha dog la sogs pa'i rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-8: rnam pa'i rang bzhin thams cad las 'das pa'i rang bzhin du ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-9: byang chub ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i cha dang bral ba rnam par dag pa tsam gyi rang bzhin du yang ma yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-10: ji tsam du mtshan mar gyur pa de dag thams cad du rang gi sems de shes par mi bya zhing btsal du mi rnyed par 'di lta ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-12: kha dog tu 'am zhes pa nas rnam pa thams cad kyi bar du yongs su btsal kyang mi dmigs pa yin te zhes pa'i bar gyis gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-13: kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i rnam par de dag re re nas smos pa yang gang dang gang la chags pa'i gnas rnams la rig pa'i gzhung gis brtags na dngos po yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-14: kha dog dang gzugs la sogs pa de dag brtag pa yang kha dog dang gzugs la sogs pa de dag sems la tha mi dad de /
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-15: sems kyi snang ba yin na ni sems nyid kyang gzugs can du 'gyur la /
T02TD2663A.1E:274b-16: ji tsam du gzugs dang ldan pa de dag thams cad ni rdul phran gyi chas gzhig na yod par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-0: kha dog la sogs pa de @275a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-1: dag sems las tha dad na yang de dag rdul phran gyi chas gzhig na yod par ma grub pas gzugs med na gzugs kyi rnam par skye ba'i rnam par shes pa mi skye ste yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-2: de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa gzhan yang phyi rol gyi yul sun phyung ste dmigs su med pas na ;
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-3: yul med par sems dang sems las byung ba mi srid pas mi dmigs so //
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-4: gsar ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i tshul dang po ste zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-5: mos pas spyod pa'i sa na sems de lta bu'i tshul du yongs su shes pa de ni sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-6: mngon par byang chub pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa gsum gyi rgyur bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-7: de las dang po'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid la 'jug pa'i sgo yin pas byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-8: chos snang pa'i sgo zhes bya ba la chos ni mya ngan las 'das pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-9: snang ba ni mkhyen zhes pa'i don te snying po byang chub nyid yin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-10: de 'thob pa'i rgyu 'am sgo yang sems yin zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-11: chos snang ba'i tshul zhes pa la chos ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste skad cig ma dang po la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi mtshan nyid mngon par byang chub nas skad cig ma gnyis pa la me long lta bu dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-13: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid thob ste kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i tshul du thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-14: dang po zhes pa ni skad cig ma dang po la byang chub thob pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-15: gang la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshegs chung dus sgom pa thams spong ting 'dzin 'thob cing zhes pa la sogs pa ni de lta bur rang gi sems yang dag ba ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa la gnas pa'i rjes su bsngags pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:275a-16: gang la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhes pa ni rang gi sems gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par mi mthong bas gnas pa la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-0: de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du ma mthong ba'i @275b sems ni rnam par dag pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-1: de ltar sems rnam par dag na lhun gyis grub pa nyid du nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang las kyi sgrib pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-2: skye ba'i sgrib pa la sogs pa thams cad spong ba'i gnyen por gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob par 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-3: de bas na tshegs chung dus sgrib pa thams cad spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob cing zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-4: de lta bu'i sems rnam par dag pa la rab tu gnas par gyur na sgrib pa thams cad bsal bas sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon sum du chos nyan zhing bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa ste lha'i mig gis lam ring bo na 'dug pa'i gzugs kyang ri dang rtsig pa la sogs pa la thogs pa med par mthong la /
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-5: lha'i rnabs lam ring po na 'dug pa'i sgra yang ri dang rtsig pa la sogs pas mi sgrib par thos shing /
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-6: gzhan gyi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa'am 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa shes pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-7: tshe rabs snga ma la yang ci byed pa dang gnas gang du gnas pa rjes su dran zhing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la sogs pa 'thob pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-8: mtha' yas pa'i mi dang lha la sogs pa'i tshig shes pa'i gzugs kyis mtha' yas pa'i bya la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro las don ston pa'i gzungs dang 'brug gi sgra dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-9: sems can ma yin pa'i sgra sa g-yo ba dang chu la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i sgra las sgra de dag gis don ci ston pa rtogs pa'i gzungs thob ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-10: sems can gyi bsam pa rjes su shes par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pas khams gsum du 'khor ba na yang thob pa'i chos las nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-12: ma thob pa yang thob par 'gyur zhing 'khor ba ji srid bar sems can gyi don bya ba dag la yongs su skyo bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-13: de'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad dang lhan cig 'grogs pa 'thob par 'gyur /
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-14: mngon par shes pa lnga dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur /
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-15: skad dang sgra dang dbyangs mtha' yas pa'i gzungs kyang 'thob par 'gyur /
T02TD2663A.1E:275b-16: sems can gyi bsam pa rjes su shes pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs bas 'khor ba na @276a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-1: yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur /
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-2: sems can gyi don bya ba dag la yongs su skyo bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-3: 'dus ma byas pa'i tshul khrims la rab tu gnas pa zhes pa ni stong pa nyid rab tu rtogs pa la gnas pas stong pa nyid kyi ngang tshul du gyur pa yin gyi sems can don byed kyang tshul khrims dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-5: sdom pa la sogs pa kun rdzob kyi tshul khrims la ni mi bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-6: log par lta ba rnam par spangs ba ni mu stegs la sogs pa'i lta ba rnams dang bral ba la bya la /
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-7: yang dag par lta ba rtogs pa khong du chud pa ni de ltar log pa'i lta ba spangs pas yang dag pa'i lta ba rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-8: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang sgrib pa thams cad spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa ni de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sngar thob nas thos pa tsam du ma zad kyi ting nge 'dzin nyid dang ldan par gnas pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-9: mos pa'i stobs bskyed pas tshegs chung dus sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-10: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rab tu spang ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems byang chub kyi mtshan nyid da lta bu lhag par mos pa'i mthu bsags pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rtogs pa dang lung gi mtshan nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-11: sku'i 'khor lo la sogs pa'i chos rnams ma bsgrubs kyang thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-12: gsang ba pa'i bdag po mdor na rigs kyi bu 'am /
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-13: rigs kyi bu mo de ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes ba ni de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi yon tan so so nas brjod na skal bar yang mi rdzogs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-14: brjod kyis mi lang bas tshad 'di tsam mo zhes gzung du med de /
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-15: mdor na yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-16: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces zhus pa zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-17: thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol /
T02TD2663A.1E:276a-18: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni gong du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-0: byang chub kyi sems kyi @276b mtshan nyid zhib du bshad de /
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-1: byang chub kyi sems de lta bu la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i yon tan gyi tshad kyang yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa zhes gsungs nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-2: de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems ji ltar skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-3: byang chub kyi sems de'i mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar shes par bya ba la sogs pa dris pa ste de yang ji lta bu snyam na /
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-4: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub tu sems skyes pa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes pa la sogs pa ste spyir na skyes pa dang skye ba zhes bya ba gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-5: de la skye ba zhes bya ba ni ming tsam ste bu mngal du zhugs pa lta bu'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-6: skyes zhes bya ba ni skyes par btags pa'i don te dper na bu btsas pa dngos lta bu'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-7: de bas na byang chub kyi sems skye ba tsam dris pa ma yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-8: sa dang po'i sems byang chub kyi mtshan nyid du yongs su rdzogs par skyes pa dris pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-9: byang chub tu zhes pa ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi phyir skye ba la bya ste ;
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-10: de yang sa dang po'i sems kyi mtshan nyid bla na med pa'i byang chub dang rang bzhin gcig pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-11: sa gong ma la sogs pas rim gyis rdzogs par byed pa yang rang bzhin de las tha dad pa ma yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-12: rang bzhin de nyid las mi mthun pa dang gnyen po la sogs pa ldog pa'i sgo nas ming gzhan du btags pa tsam du zad de /
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-13: dper na gser nyid las rgyan la sogs par byas na rang bzhin gcig kyang ming gi rnam grangs mang por thogs pa dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-14: de bas na byang chub kyi rang bzhin sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems de la bya ba yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-15: smon pa dang 'jug pa'i sems kyang byang chub kyi phyir sems pa yin mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-16: sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems ltar bla na med pa'i byang chub dang rang bzhin mi gcig pas de dag la ni mi bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-17: yang rnam pa gcig tu na lan bka' stsal pa nas dang po'i mtshan nyid kyi byang chub gsungs pas na gzhan ma yin par mngon no //
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-18: byang chub 'byung ba'i sems skyes pa'i //
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-19: mtshan nyid ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi //
T02TD2663A.1E:276b-20: zhes pa ni sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems de las bla na med pa'i byang chub 'byung bas de ni byang chub 'byung ba zhes bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:277a-0: byang chub 'byung ba'i sems de skye ba'i mtshan nyid bsod nams chen po'i snying po nas nam mkha' @277a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:277a-1: bzhin du tshad med pa la sogs pa la dris pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:277a-2: sems mkhyen pa ni rnams kyi mchog / dpa' chen ye shes las byung ba //
T02TD2663A.1E:277a-3: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das la yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa ste bcom ldan 'das ni 'jig rten dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:277a-4: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems mkhyen pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir dang /
