T02TD2663A.1E:293b-10: de bas na 'dir yang sngar rgyas par bshad pa'i don de nyid phyis bsdus te bshad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:293b-11: de yang de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:293b-12: mchog skyes de dag dbugs phyin 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.1E:293b-13: zhes pa'i bar du phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba'i tshig ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:293b-14: mgon po khyab bdag khyod kyis ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:293b-15: sems kyi mtshan nyid bstan lags na //
T02TD2663A.1E:293b-16: zhes pa ni sngar sems rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad pa de dbugs dbyung ba rnam pa dus thob par 'gyur zhes zhus pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:293b-17: dbugs 'byin rnam pa du thob nas //
T02TD2663A.1E:293b-18: zhes pa la phyi nas dbugs dbyung ba zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:293b-19: ji ltar 'jig rten na grags pa lam 'phrang 'jigs pa'i sa nas rkun po la sogs pa'i 'tshe ba las thar na dbugs dbyung ba zhes bya ba de bzhin du /
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-0: 'dir yang 'khor ba'i dgon pa na rnam par 'khyams pa'i sems can @294a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-1: las dang nyon mongs pa'i rkun pos 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa las thar ba na dbugs dbyung ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-2: de las thar na gzhan dbugs dbyung bar bya ba'i sa med de dbugs dbyung ba gcig tu zad na /
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-3: ci'i phyir dbugs dbyung ba dus thob ces mang po'i tshig tu smos she na /
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-4: ji ltar 'jig rten pa rnams 'jigs pa gcig la thar nas 'jigs pa de las dbyugs phyung mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-5: de las gzhan pa'i 'jigs pa rnams las mthar na dbugs ma phyung ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-6: de bzhin du 'dir yang mi dge ba gang mi mthun pa gegs su gyur pa de las thar te dbugs phyung yang de las gzhan pa'i gegs su gyur pa rnams ma thar na de la dbugs ma phyung ba zhes bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-7: de bas na dbugs dbyung rnam pa dus zhes smos so //
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-8: mchog skyes ni sras rnams te /
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-9: mchog ni chos kyi dbyings te de bzhin nyid yin la de las skyes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-10: de dag dbugs phyin par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-11: de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-12: rnam par snang mdzad chen po yis //
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-13: de tshe phyag na rdo rje la //
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-14: yid bsdus de ni nyon zhes gsungs //
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-15: zhes pa nas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid med do zhes stong pa'i ye shes skyes pa de'i tshe chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis dbugs phyin pa yin no zhes pa'i bar du phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa rnams kyi lan bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal ba yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-16: yid bsdus de ni nyon zhes pa ni snod rnam pa bzhi'i gnyen por gsungs pa ste sngar bshad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-17: nam byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag mi dge ba'i las spangs te dge ba'i las byed pa de'i tshe dge bas dbugs phyin pa yin no zhes pa ni byis pa phyugs dang 'dra ba rnams 'khor ba na 'khyams pa las 'khor ba las skyo ste bsod nams kyi 'du shes skyes na smyung bar 'dug cing sbyin pa la sogs pa byed pa ni dge bas dbugs phyin ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-18: de la dge ba zhes pa ni dbugs dbyung ba gzhan yang dge ba yin na /
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-19: ci'i phyir 'ba' zhig la dge ba zhes bya zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:294a-20: gzhan yang dge ba yin mod kyi 'on kyang gzhan rnams la so so'i ming yod pas 'di la dge ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-0: nam bdag gi kho na nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa de'i tshe bdag la @294b brten nas dbugs phyin pa yin no zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-1: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sems brgyad spyod pa na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de 'jig rten pa rnams kyis bdag tu brtags pa'i dngos po ji lta bu nyid du shes nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-2: bdag la brten zhing 'jig rten pa'i las rnams goms par byed pa ni bdag la brten nas dbugs phyin pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-3: bdag gi de kho na nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-4: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin shes pa la ni mi bya'i 'jig rten pa'i gzhung bzhin du bdag gis ngo bor brtags pa de phyin ci ma log par shes pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-5: nam phung po yongs su gzung ba byas te /
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-6: rang gi ngo bo la rnam par dpyad nas bdag la brten pa yongs su gtong ba de'i tshe bdag med pas dbugs phyin pa yin no zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-7: gang zag gi bdag med par rtogs la phung por brtags pa yod par 'dzin pa de ni bdag med pas dbugs phyin pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-8: nam phung po rnams spangs nas chos kyi dmigs pa la gnas pa de'i tshe chos kyis dbugs phyin pa yin no zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-9: phung por brtags pa yod par 'dzin pa de ni dbu ba dang chu bur la sogs pa'i tshul du bshig na /
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-10: phung por brtags pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin gyi chos rnams so so'i mtshan nyid tsam 'ba' zhig yod par rtogs pa ni chos kyi dbugs phyin pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-11: nam chos rnams spangs mi skye ba la gnas pa de'i tshe chos la bdag med pas dbugs phyin pa yin no zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-12: phung po la sogs pa'i chos rnams sgyu ma dang smig rgyu'i tshul du bshig na yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:294b-13: rnam par shes pa tsam du zad par rtogs la rnam par shes pa de nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma'i mtha' rnyed de rang bzhin med pa gzod ma nas ma skyes par rtogs pa de ni chos la bdag med pas dbugs phyin pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-0: mi skye ba dag kyang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi @295a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-1: yang ngo bo nyid med do zhes stong pa'i ye shes skyes pa de'i tshe chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis dbugs phyin pa yin no zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-2: phung po la sogs pa'i chos rnams bdag med par rtogs te rnam par shes pa tsam du zad par shes pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-3: rnam par shes pa de yang gzod ma nas ma skyes par rtogs te stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du shes pa'i stong pa'i rang bzhin de yang ngo bo nyid med par rtogs pa ni stong pa sa dang po'i sems kyi mtshan nyid stong pa'i yang stong pa ste mnyam pa nyid kyis dbugs phyin pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-4: de rnams ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa bshad pa la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-5: rgyu phun sum thogs pa bshad pa yang de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gzhan yang rgyu'i gnas skabs nas 'byung ba /
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-6: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-7: rtog pa thams cad spangs pa yin //
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-8: gang zhig de rtogs 'dod pa des //
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-9: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-10: zhes pa ste bla na med pa'i byang chub de rtogs par 'dod pa de ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-11: sa dang po man chad rnams 'ba' zhig la mi bya'i /
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-12: sa bcu dang kun du bzang po'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang bla na med pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'dod pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-13: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi spyod pa yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyur rig par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-14: da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-15: sngags rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub kyi sems so zhes gzhung las gsungs na /
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-23: bya ba'i rnam pa dang bral ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du yang ngo bo nyid med pa yin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-26: de ston par byed pa'i sgra dang yig 'bru rnams te /
T02TD2663A.1E:295a-29: tha ma'i tha grub pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-2: mngon spyod la sogs pa'i las rnams kyi bya ba byed de /
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-3: de ltar mi mthun na de rnams ji ltar rig par bya zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-6: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa bzhi bcus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams bsgoms te gsang sngags kyi tshul rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-7: yong kyang kun rdzob kyi chos rnams ni rigs pas brtag mi bzod de /
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-8: don dam par na stong pa'i rang bzhin yin mod kyi 'on kyang kun rdzob tu so so'i rgyu dang 'bras bu nges pa'i bya ba rnams kyang byed par 'gyur te med ces byar mi rung ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-9: de ltar stong pa'i rang bzhin las kun rdzob tu yod par snang ba ni sgyu ma la sogs pa dang 'dra'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-10: de bzhin du sngags kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems de yang don dam par stong pa yin mod kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-11: sgrub pa po'i sbyor ba'i mthus grub pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kun rdzob tu snang zhing myong bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-12: de rnams kyang sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpes bshad pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-16: rmi lam dang zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-17: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang //
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-18: ji ltar 'ga' zhig bdag nyid kyi //
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-19: lag na mgal me thogs nas ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-20: bskor na 'khor lo ltar snang ba //
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-21: de bzhin stong pa dag las 'byung //
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-23: de la sgyu ma gang zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-25: sman dang sngags kyis sbyor ba byed pa dag gi sbyor ba las dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs mig dang yid 'phrog pa sngon ma mthong ba dag kyang ston te /
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-26: de dag ni phan tshun phyogs bcur 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med do //
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-28: sgyu ma ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir te /
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-29: de bzhin du gsang sngags sbyor ba byed pa dag gi sbyor ba las thams cad 'byung ngo zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:295b-30: ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis gsang sngags dang sman gyi sbyor ba las ba lang dang rta la sogs pa'i dngos po rnam pa mang pos yid dang mi chags par byed par snang ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-0: @296a * // de rnams kyang ba glang rta la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du yod pa ma yin pas na phyogs bcur 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med de /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-1: 'on kyang de dag ba glang la sogs pa'i bya ba yang byed do //
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-2: de bzhin du sngags kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems de stong pa nyid yin kyang sbyor ba las sngags kyi dngos grub kyi sbyor ba sbyar na rab dang 'bring la sogs pa'i grub pa'i 'bras bu rig 'dzin dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-3: nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang mi snang bar 'gro ba la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs su snang zhing myong par byed do //
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-4: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-5: smig rgyu ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste de yang 'du shes kyis tha snyad tsam du 'dogs shing tha snyad sgrub par byed do //
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-6: de bzhin du 'du shes 'di yang gsang sngags so zhes tha snyad du 'dogs shing tha snyad kyang sgrub par byed do zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-7: de ltar sngags kyi 'bras bu sgyu ma dang 'dra na sngags kyi dngos po ci zhig ce na /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-9: ji ltar 'brog dgon par smig rgyu la mi'am /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-10: ri dags rnams kyis chur 'du shes te /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-11: de na chu yod pa ma yin yang smig rgyu de'i rnam pa'i rnam par shes pa bskyed cing skom pa yang chus ngoms pa'i bya ba byed de de bzhin du sngags de yang dngos po yod pa ma yin pas 'du shes tsam du zad mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-12: 'on kyang sngags kyi dngos grub kyi 'bras bu bskrun pa'i bya ba byed do //
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-14: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-15: rmi lam na bdag nyid nyin gcig dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-19: lo la sogs par 'dug cing bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po myong bar mthong la /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-20: sad na ci yang mi mthong ba de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di yang rmi lam lta bur khong du chud par bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-21: sngar sngags bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu'i dpe sgyu ma las blangs pa de sgyu ma ni yun ring du 'dug pa ma yin gyi skad cig yud tsam dag tu zad la sngags kyi 'bras bu ni bskal ba la sogs par yun ring du 'dug na ji ltar dper rung zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-22: rmi lam gyi dpes yun ring du gnas par bstan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:296a-23: ji ltar rmi lam na yul gyi dngos po med par skad cig dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-0: lo la @296b sogs par yul rnams spyod cing bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po myong zhing rigs par mthong ste de las sad na dngos po gang yang med do //
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-1: de ltar yang cis mngon zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-2: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal pa'i mdo las kyang gsungs pa /
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-3: ji ltar bu mo gzhan nu'i rmi lam na //
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-4: bu pho byung zhing shi ba de mthong nas //
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-5: byung na dga' zhing shi na mi dga' ltar //
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-6: zhes pa ste de ltar rmi lam na yun ring por srid do //
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-7: de bzhin du sngags bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu yang rang bzhin med pa las rnal 'byor pas bsgrubs na grub pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs tshe rabs dang bskal pa la sogs par gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-8: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang //
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-9: gsang sngags kyi dngos grub 'byung ba ni gzugs brnyan lta bur 'gyur par rig par bya ste zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-10: de ltar sngags grub pa de rnams dngos po med par yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa las byung na sgrub pa po thams cad kyis grub pa ci'i phyir mi 'thob ce na /
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-11: ji ltar gzugs brnyan de rdo dang shing gzhan las mi 'byung gi / me long gi dkyil 'khor dag pa las 'byung par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-12: de bzhin du sngags kyi grub pa de yang sgrub pa po thams cad la mi 'byung gi / gang byang chub kyi sems bsgoms shing rgyud dag par gyur pa de la 'byung par bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-13: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang /
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-14: grub pa'i grub gnas ni dri za'i grong khyer lta bur blta'o zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-15: ji ltar dri za rnams kyi grong khyer dri za de rnams kyis gang du bsams pa der grong thal byung du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-16: de bzhin du gsang sngags grub pa de yang bdag nyid kyi lus rig 'dzin la sogs par grub pa'i phyir bsgrubs kyi gzhan gyi phyir ma bsgrubs kyang nam rig 'dzin la sogs pa grub na lha'i gzhal med khang dpag bsam gyi shing dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-18: shel gyi brag las bdud rtsi'i chu 'bab pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-19: rin po che'i gsing mal sogs pa'i gnas rnams bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ba bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:296b-20: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi sgra ni brag ca lta bur rig par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-0: dper na sgra la brten nas brag ca 'byung pa ltar gsang sngags @297a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-1: kyi tshul 'di yang de dang 'dra par rig par bya'o zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-2: ji ltar sgra'i rkyen gyis brag ca 'byung bas dngos po yod pa ma yin yang sgrar 'byung ba de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi sgra yang sngags kyi rang bzhin gyis stong mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-3: sgrub pa'i rkyen gyis sgra de 'byung ba ni dper na brag ca dang 'dra bar bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-4: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang /
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-5: zla ba shar na chu'i nang du gzugs brnyan mthong nas chu zla zhes brjod pa de bzhin du /
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-6: sngags pa de nyid kyang chu zla bzhin du rig sngags 'chang zhes brjod do zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-7: zla ba shar ba'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du 'byung pa de ni zla ba'i rang bzhin de las mi gzhan no //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-8: de bzhin du sngags grub pa'i rig 'dzin de yang rig 'dzin gyi lus bzang po la sogs pa ni sgrub pa'i gzugs de las gzhan ma yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-9: gzugs de nyid las 'gyur mod kyi //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-10: 'on kyang rig 'dzin zhes brjod do zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-11: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-12: ji ltar char pa bab pa na //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-13: chu yi chu bur rnams 'byung ba //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-14: de bzhin gsang sngags grub pa yi //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-15: sprul pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-16: ces pa ni sngags gcig pu las grub pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa mang por ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-17: chu'i chu bur gyi dpes sngags de gcig pu yin yang grub pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa mang po 'byung par bstan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-18: ji ltar char pa bab pa na chu gcig pu de las chu'i chu bur che phra la sogs pa rnams pa mang po 'byung ba de bzhin du sngags gcig pu las kyang grub pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa du ma 'byung ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-19: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang /
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-20: sems can med cing srog dang ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-21: byed pa po yang med pa ste //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-22: dngos po thams cad stong nyid la //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-23: 'khrul pa kho na snang bar zad //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-25: de ltar sngags kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid de sems can nam srog gam byed pa'i mkhan po med de /
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-26: stong pa nyid yin kyang grub pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa kun du snang ba ni 'khrul pa snang bar bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-27: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang /
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-28: ji ltar 'ga' zhig bdag nyid kyi //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-29: lag na mgal me thogs nas ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-30: bskor na 'khor lo ltar snang ba //
T02TD2663A.1E:297a-31: de bzhin stong pa dag las 'byung //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-0: zhes pa ni 'khrul pa la snang @297b ba'i dpe'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-2: 'di ni theg pa chen po'i gzhi //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-4: ye shes sna tshogs cher 'byung ba //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-5: nor gyi dbyig 'di shes na ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-6: kun gyi sems kyi bye brag kyang //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-7: ji bzhin yang dag rab tu shes //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-8: zhes pa'i bar du sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems mnyam pa nyid rtogs /
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-9: pa de'i rjes su sngags pa bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-10: theg pa chen po'i gzhi zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems de ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-11: theg pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-12: byang chub kyi sems de shes na 'jigs rten pa'i sems brgyad nas sa rab tu dga' ba'i bar gyi rim pa de rnams rab tu shes pas na de'i gnas so zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-13: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzhi //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-14: zhes pa la mi mnyam pa ni nam mkha' ste nam mkha' la mtha' med pas gang dang yang mi mnyam la de dang mnyam pa ni chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid de /
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-15: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin de shes pa ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gnas so //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-16: nges pa'i gzhi zhes pa ni chos rnams stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du phyin ci ma log par nges par shes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-17: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzhi zhes pa ni sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa de bla na med pa'i byang chub dang tha mi dad de ro gcig pas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-18: mthar gyis theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa'i gzhi ste zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-19: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyu 'jig rten pa dang 'jigs rten las 'das pa'i sems 'og ma rnams kyang sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems 'di'i nang du 'dus la sa dang po nas kun du bzang po'i sa man chad kyi sems kyang 'di las tha mi dad pa'i phyir de rnams kyi gnas su gyur pas na mthar gyis theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa'i gzhi zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-20: ye shes sna tshogs cher 'byung ba //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-21: nor gyi dbyig 'di shes na ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-22: kun gyi sems kyi bye brag kyang //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-23: ji bzhin yang dag rab tu shes //
T02TD2663A.1E:297b-24: zhes pa ni sa dang po'i byang chub kyi sems de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i gtso bo yin pas ye shes nas tshogs che 'byung ba yin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:298a-0: de legs par shes na rnam pa rnams mdzad kyi rgyu dang 'jigs rten dang 'jigs rten las 'das pa'i sems kyi khyad par thams @298a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:298a-1: cad rab tu shes par gyur pa bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:298a-2: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las sems kyi khyad par rim par phye ba dang po'o /
T02TD2663A.1E:298a-4: // / da ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes des mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams tshul nas tshogs dang bsam pa sna tshogs dang thabs sna tshogs kyis bla na med par bsgral ba'i phyir sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis lhun gyis grub pa nyid du sku mnyam pa nyid mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi 'khor los khams gsum thams cad du khyab par mdzad pa /
T02TD2663A.1E:298a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun du bzang po dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:298a-6: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i yongs su dag pa rnams kyis mngon sum du mthong zhing spyod yul du 'gyur na /
T02TD2663A.1E:298a-7: 'gro ba 'og ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo de spyod yul du ma gyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:298a-8: sems can de rnams kyi don du sku la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs par byin brlab par bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa 'chad de /
T02TD2663A.1E:298a-9: gsol ba de yang de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:298a-10: bco ldan 'das gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyi pa'i slad du bshad du gsol /
T02TD2663A.1E:298a-11: de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mang po dag gi don dang phan pa dang bde par 'gyur lags so zhes pa'i bar du ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:298a-12: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa sems kyi sa las 'das pa de thugs su chud nas sems can rnams so so'i dad pa dang rjes su mthun la /
T02TD2663A.1E:298b-0: so so'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i sku la sogs pa'i 'khor los sems can gyi khams thams cad du khyab par rnam par sprul pa phyag na rdo rjes ji @298b ltar mthong zhing rtogs pa de bcom ldan 'das la slar bzlas te gsol pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:298b-1: de ltar slar gsol pa yang ston pas ci bshad pa rnams nyan pa pos khong du chud pa'i tshul gyis slar mnyan na ston pa po spro ba dang skabs 'og man dang mtshams sbyar pa la yang bde ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:298b-2: ngo mtshar lags so zhes pa ni de ltar stong pa nyid brjod pa dang rtogs pa las 'das pa thugs su chud kyang sku la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis tshul sna tshogs dang bsam pa sna tshogs dang thabs sna tshogs kyis sprul pa de ngo mtshar che'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:298b-3: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa de gzhan las mnyan nas thugs su chud pa ma yin gyi bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi thugs su chud pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:298b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul snying rje chen po snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mang po dag gi don dang phan pa dang bde par 'gyur lags so zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo de bdag cag gis rtogs shing spyod yul du gyur na yang ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don du sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo de rnams dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya'i sgo nas 'gro ba de rnams kyi spyod yul du 'gyur par byin gyis brlab tu gsol ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:298b-5: snying rje chen po 'byung ba zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor de snying rje chen po las 'byung ba la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:298b-6: dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni 'og nas gzhung nyid las 'chad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:298b-7: rgyal po zhes pa ni de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i nang du 'dus pas na rgyal po zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:298b-8: yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas sgrub cing lha mnyes par bya'i spyod pa rnam pa bcu drug gis lha mnyes par bya ba yang sgrub pa'i sgo nas bzlas pa'i yan lag bzhi dang rang gi sems yongs su sbyang ba la sogs pa'i spyod pas lha mnyes par byas te /
T02TD2663A.1E:298b-9: rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i grub pa thob nas rim gyis sang rgyas su 'grub pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-1: su sbyangs pas mngon par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa rdzogs nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnyed par gyur pa ni dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-2: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mang po dag gi don dang phan pa dang bde par 'gyur pa'i phyir gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul de bshad du gsol zhes spyar te ma 'ongs pa'i sems can de rnams kyis dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de thob par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor de bshad du gsol zhes pa ste don dang zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa'i don gyi phyir ro ;
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-4: / phan pa dang zhes pa ni tshe phyi ma la phan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-5: bde bar 'gyur zhes pa ni tshe 'di la bde ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-6: yang na don dang zhes pa ni phan pa dang bde pa'i don la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-7: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul zhes pa la gsang sngags kyi spyod pa ni dkyil 'khor dang bsgrub pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-8: de dag nyid tshul te tshul zhes pa ni rgya gar skad kyi gzhung dang sbyar na 'gro ba'am thob pa la bya ste gsang sngags kyi spyod pa des bla na med pa'i sang rgyas su 'gro ba'am thob pa de bshad du gsol zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par sang mdzad kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil nag pa zhes pa la ni ni nges pa aa ya thob pa'am 'gro ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-10: 'khor la gzigs nas zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag gi nang na g-yeng ba yod dam med pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-11: nyan pa po snod du ma gyur pa yod dam med brtags pa'i phyir gzigs pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-12: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni yongs su dag pa sha stag yin na ci'i phyir g-yeng ba dang snod du ma gyur pa srid ce na /
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-13: de'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la g-yeng pa dang snod du ma gyur pa med mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:299a-15: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nyan pa rnams la de lta bu srid pas de dag la brtag pa'i tshul bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:299b-0: lag na rdo rje dkyil 'khor spyad pa'i tshul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyon cig ces pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas lha mnyes par bya ba'i spyod pa rnam pa @299b bcu drug bshad pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:299b-1: de bzhin du rim gyis grub pa'i sgo nas lha mnyes par bya ba'i spyod pa bzlas pa yan lag bzhi dang rang gi sems yongs su sbyang bar byas pas lha mnyes par 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:299b-2: rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i grub pa mngon du thob nas rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzog pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:299b-3: dkyil 'khor spyad pa zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor bri ba la sogs pa spyod pa rnam pa bcu drug la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:299b-5: chos kyi rnam grangs zhes pa ni don gyi dngos po gcig la tshig mang po'i sgo nas don gyi dmigs bstan ba la bya ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas kyang 'gyur /
T02TD2663A.1E:299b-6: sngags spyad pa'i sgo nas kyang 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:299b-7: de yang skabs 'dir sngags kyi ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:299b-8: de bas na dkyil 'khor spyad pa'i tshul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:299b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi dbyings kyi dgongs pa ma rdzogs shing sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral par dam bca' ba mdzad pas zhes pa byung nas kyang phyogs bcu kun du bskor te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i nang rang gi gnas rnams su zhugs so zhes pa'i bar du ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don du snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:299b-10: ting nge 'dzin bstan pa yang snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu mngon du byas te /
T02TD2663A.1E:299b-11: de nas sa tshon gyis sku'i cha lugs la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i tshul bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:299b-12: de la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi dbyangs kyi dongs pa ma rdzogs pa chos kyi dbyings ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:299b-16: de'i dgos pa'i sku la sogs pas mi za dpa'i rgyan gyis sems can gyi khams gtams cad kun du khyab par bstan nas sems can de rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsgral ba la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-1: kyang da dung ma lus par ma bsgral bas dgos pa ma rdzogs zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-2: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral par dam bca' pa mdzad pas zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-3: de ltar chos kyi dgos pa de ma rdzogs pa yang rdzogs shing zad pa ma yin gyi bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na thugs kyi yi dam mdzad pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-4: bdag gis byang chub thob nas sems can ma lus pa yang bsgral bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-5: de bas na sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral bar dam bca' ba mdzad ces so //
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang thabs cig yang dag par mol nas zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-7: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs dang chos kyi sku dang 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas mnyam pa nyid de /
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-8: de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad gsung gcig tu 'chad par bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-9: gnyis su na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang thabs cig yang dag par mol nas zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-10: chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid mngon du byas nas zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-11: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang thabs cig mol sna zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-12: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba nga rgyal can rnams nga rgyal gcag pa dang zhu gtug mi byed pa rnams bla ma dang grogs po la dri zhing zhu gtug byed pa la brtson pa bskyed pa'i phyir te /
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa yang gzhan dang bka' gros mdzad cing chos ston na /
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-14: bdag cag chod lta ci zhig snyam nas gzhan la 'dri ba la brtson par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-15: snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-16: ting nge 'dzin de las snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'am /
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-17: snying rje chen po las ting nge 'dzin 'byung ba la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-18: bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sku'i yan lag thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:300a-19: sa bcu'i bar du sems can la phan ba'i don mdzad pa rnams byung ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-0: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu kun du bskor te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i nang rang gi gnas rnams su zhugs so zhes pa ni @300b bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa de'i tshe ba spu'i bu ga re re nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dra ba rnam par sprul pa byung ste sems can gyi don byed pa ni sa dang po nas brtsams nas sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-1: de dag slar bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la so so'i gnas su zhugs pa yang ting nge 'dzin brtan pa'i mthus pa spu'i bu ga gang nas byung ba de nyid du slar ma 'khrul bar zhugs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-2: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-3: lag na rje dkyil 'khor rnam par dgod pa nyon cig ces pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-4: ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas phyag na rdo rje la dkyil 'khor bshad pa la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-5: dkyil 'khor bri ba bshad pa de yang rgyu dang rang bzhin dang 'bras bu rnam pa gsum du blta ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-6: de la rgyu ni slob dpon no //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-7: rang bzhin ni dkyil 'khor sa bcad cing bri ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-8: 'bras bu ni slob ma 'jug cing dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-9: de la dkyil 'khor bri ba'i rgyu'i gtso bo ni slob dpon yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-10: de bas na slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid thog mar bshad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-11: slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bshad pa yang slob dpon du 'jug pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-12: slob dpon du grub pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang de'i rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-13: de la slob dpon du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni yid byang chub kyi sems la zhugs pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-14: slob dpon du grub pa'i mtshan nyid ni dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i las byed par gnang zhing dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-15: rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-16: byang chub sems la rnam par gnas //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-18: de dag kyang lus kyi yon tan dang ngag gi yon tan dang yid kyi yon tan gsum ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-19: ji ltar rigs par spyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-20: yid byang chub kyi sems la zhugs pa zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-21: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i chos rnam pa stong par 'jigs pa dang 'jug pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-22: shes rab dang ldan pa zhes pa la shes rab rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-23: rang bzhin gyis shes rab rno ba dang thos pa dang bsam pa la sogs pa'i shes rab ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:300b-24: de dag gang yang rung ba dang ldan pa'o//
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-0: @301a * // snying rje can zhes pa snying rje ni sems can sdug bsngal las 'don par 'dod pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-1: de yang rang bzhin gyi snying rje can dang mngon par 'dus byas pa'i snying rje ste de dag dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-2: sgyu rtsal dag la mkhas pa zhes pa ni spyir 'jig rten gyi dgra thabs la sogs pa rnam pa mang mod kyi skabs 'dir ni dkyil 'khor bri ba dang mchod pa'i yan lag rnams la mkhas pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la rtag tu mkhas pa zhes pa ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob rnam pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis mkhas pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-4: don dam par ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma byung ma skyes pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du bsgom pa la mkhas pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-5: kun rdzob tu ni de ltar stong pa nyid bsgom pa las langs nas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams spyad nas de la yang mi chags par 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul du sbyor ba la mkhas pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-6: theg pa gsum gyi khyad par shes pa zhes pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa gang zag la bdag med par rtogs nas phung po dang khams la sogs pa la mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med par rtogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa phung po la sogs pa de rnams kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-8: theg pa chen po chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma byung ma skyes par rtog pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid bye brag tu 'byed mkhas pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-9: de la cir theg pa gcig la gsum du dbye ci yod ce na theg pa nyid gsum du dbye ba la ni mi bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-10: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi so so'i ji ltar rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid 'byed mkhas pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-11: gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi don la mkhas zhes pa ni sngags rnams kyi spyi'i de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni byang chub kyi sems te /
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-15: ting nge 'dzin rnams la mkhas pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-16: sngags la mkhas pa ni sngags kyi tshig rnams bskul ba dang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin 'byed mkhas pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301a-17: yi ge sa bon la mkhas pa ni lha rnams so so'i sa bon snying po gang yin pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-0: de rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi @301b sgo dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-1: las gang yin pa la mkhas pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-2: ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa ni ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa las dbang chen dang chu la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod cing de rnams kyi las sgrub pa la mkhas pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-3: bsam pa shes pa ni slob ma rnams kyi bsam pa shes pa ste de yang gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i tshul gyis shes pa la ni mi bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-4: sngags kyi cha brtag pa'i tshul gyis slob ma rnams kyi spyod pa dang tshul la brtags nas lha zhi ba dang khro bo rnams gang bsnyen par 'os pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-5: grub pa rab 'bring gsum las gang bsgrub par 'os pa la sogs pa'i tshul la mkhas pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-6: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnams la dad pa zhes pa ni de rnams kyi yon tan bshad pa la yid ches pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-7: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las byed par gnang zhing dbang bskur ba zhes pa la dbang bskur ba ni dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor du dri dang me tog dang sman dang rin po che la sogs pas brgyan pa'i bum par chu blugs te dbang bskur ba la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-8: gnang ba ni de ltar dbang bskur nas khyod kyis dkyil 'khor bri ba dang sgrub pa la spyod par gyis shig ces tshig gis gnang ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-9: de la gnang zhing dbang bskur ba zhes pa dbang ma bskur bar ni gnang ba mi 'thob ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-10: gnang ba smos pas dbang bskur ba ma smos kyang zhar la go bar 'gyur na gnyis ka ci'i phyir smos she na /
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-11: gdon sel ba la sogs pa'i las phran tshegs la dbang ma bskur kyang byos shig pa'i gnang ba thob pa srid de /
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-12: de bas na gnang ba thob cing dbang bskur ba zhes smos so//
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-13: brtan pa ni shes pa dang longs spyod la sogs pa dang ldan pa yang de dag gis dregs par mi 'gyur la de dag dang mi ldan na yang zhum par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-14: sbyor ba la mkhas zhes pa ni sgrub pa dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi sbyor ba la mkhas pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-15: byang chub sems la rnam par gnas //
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-16: zhes pa ni stong ba nyid rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nus pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:301b-17: gsang ba pa'i bdag po slob dpon de lta bu rgyal ba'i sras yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-0: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags so zhes pa la slob dpon de lta bu ni gong du smos pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan @302a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-2: / rgyal ba'i sras zhes pa ni rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las skyes pa ste rgyal ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-3: de'i bdag nyid ni chos kyi dbyings te /
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-4: chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid la mos pa las byung ba ni rgyal ba'i bdag nyid las skyes pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags so zhes pa ni de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i slob dpon de ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags so //
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-6: de lta bu'i slob dpon de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags na /
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-7: mi bsngags pa'i slob dpon yang yod dam zhe na yod de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngags so zhes pa'i tshig des slob dpon rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya ste zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa dang dmigs pa can no //
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-8: de la skabs 'dir slob dpon yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa ni zab cing rgya che ba'i slob dpon la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-9: dmigs pa can gyi slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid ni 'og nas slob dpon gnyi ga'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'i skabs su shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-10: da ni slob dpon de lta bus dkyil 'khor du gzung ba'i slob ma rnams brtag par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-11: slob ma de rnams brtag pa yang rang bzhin gyi yon tan dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-12: mngon par 'dus byas pa'i yon tan gyi sgo nas so //
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-13: de lta bas na gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la slob dpon la gzhan gyis gsol ba btab kyang rung zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams kyis gsol ba btab kyang rung zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-14: yang na bdag gis sems can dag / snod du rung zhing nyes bral ba //
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-15: de mthong nas ni bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-16: ma gsol bar ni de bos te //
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-17: zhes sbyar te snod du rung zhing zhes pa ni sngags bshad pa'i snod du 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-18: nyes bral ba zhes pa ni sdig pa med pa ste de la sdig pa ni sems kyi rgyud la yod na ji ltar slob dpon des mthong bar 'gyur zhan /
T02TD2663A.1E:302a-19: sems kyi rgyud la gzhan pa'i sdig pa med par mthong ba la ni mi bya'i /
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-0: sdig pa'i rgyu mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi spyod par mthong ba ni sdig pa med par @302b mthong ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-1: de lta bu'i slob ma mthong na phas ma gsol kyang slob ma de snod du 'gyur ba yin pas 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas chos bshad cing sngags kyi tshul la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-2: mos mang zhes pa ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi chos rnams ma rtogs shing mngon du byas kyang thos pa dang bsam pa dang sgom pa'i sgo nas 'di nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes pa ni mos pa mang ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-3: brtan zhes pa ni gong du slob dpon gyi brtan pa nyid bshad pa dang mthun no //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-4: dad pa zhes pa ni dkon mchog gsum la yid ches pa'i rnam pa dang sngags kyi tshul la yid ches pa'i dad pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-5: gzhan la phan dga' zhes pa ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-6: gzhan sdug bsngal dang bral bar dga' ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-7: slob ma de lta bu dang ldan par shes shing mthong nas bdag nyid kyis ma gsol bar ni de bos te zhes gong du smos pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par mthong nas shes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-8: 'di skad bya zhes pa ni gal te slob ma de bdag cag sngags grub pa'i 'bras bu rig 'dzin la sogs pa 'dod pa ma yin gyi bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod do snyam du sems pa la /
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-9: sngags kyi sgo nas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos shod cig ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-10: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin gyis //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-11: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-12: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-13: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-14: zhes pa ni sngags spyad pa'i tshul 'di theg pa chen po yin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-15: de yang slob ma snod du gyur pa'i phyir bshad pas na yang dag par bshad pa yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-16: khe dang bkur sti'i phyir bshad pa ni ma yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-17: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-18: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-19: da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams //
T02TD2663A.1E:302b-20: 'gro pan phyir bzhugs pa dag / ces pa ni 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma byon pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsang sngags kyi spyad pa'i cho ga mchog 'di las byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud rnam pa bzhi bcom nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes te /
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-0: de bas na slob ma khyed rnams kyis kyang cho ga mchog 'di las @303a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-1: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan ba ste de bas na /
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-2: de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-3: cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-4: dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-5: thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-6: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-7: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-8: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-9: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-10: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-11: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / ces gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-12: de dag kun gyis zhes pa ni 'das pa dad da ltar dang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-13: byang chub shing drung du thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-14: zhes pa ni byang chub kyi shing gi drung du thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan ma med pa thob pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-15: sngags kyi sbyor ba mnyam med de //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-16: zhes pa ni gang dang yang mi mnyam pa'i sngags kyi sbyor ba des thams cad mkhyen pa thob par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-17: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-18: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / ces pa ni de ltar sh'akya seng ges kyang sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgo nas thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes pas na khyod kyis kyang 'di'i sgo nas thams cad mkhyen pa thob par gyis shig ces bshad pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-19: de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'og min gyi gnas la sogs par mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa gzhan yang yod mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-20: skabs 'dir mi rnams la bshad pa'i phyir sprul pa'i skus byang chub kyi shing drung du mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa bstan to //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-21: de ltar lan mang gzengs bstod de /
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-22: zhes pa ni gong du smos pa'i tshul gyis slob ma de mang du spro ba bskyed cig ces pa'o//
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-23: snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-24: zhes pa khe dang bkur sti'i phyir ma yin gyi slob ma de dag la snying rje ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-25: slob ma de brtan shes nas ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-26: zhes pa ni slob ma de rnams de ltar gong du smos pa'i tshul gyis yid ches te gzhan du mi 'gyur bar gyur na slob ma de dag gi ched du dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa rnams brtag par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-27: de yang sa nyid kyi yon tan gyis dga' ba dang //
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-28: 'phags pa rnams kyis bcags pas dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-29: lha dang mi rnams kyis bsnyen pas dga' ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:303a-30: sngags mkhan nyid gang du dad pas dga' ba'o//
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-0: @303b de las nyid kyi yon tan gyis dga' ba'i gnas ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-1: me tog 'bras bu ldan pa'i ri //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-2: gtsang zhing yid 'ong chu yi gnas //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-4: gang na 'bab chu mang po dag / ngang pa bzhad kyis brgyan yod pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-5: der ni sngags pa blo can gyis //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-8: sangs rgyas rnams dang rang mgon dang //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-9: de bzhin rgyal ba'i na yan thos kyis //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-10: sa phyogs gang dag bsten pa ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-11: de dag thub pas rtag tu bsngags //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-12: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni 'phags pa rnams kyis zhabs kyis bcags pas dga' ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-13: phyogs gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa//
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-14: lha khang kun dga' bzang po dang //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-15: khyim dang yang tog nyams dga' dang //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-17: lha yi gnas rnams thams cad dang //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-18: de bzhin khang pa stong par yang //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-19: slob ma dag la phan 'dod phyir //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-20: nan tan du ni dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-21: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni lha dang mi rnams kyis bsnyen pas dga' ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-22: yang na yid du 'ong ba'i sa //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-23: gang yang rung bar bri bar bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-24: zhes pa ni gong du smos pa rnam pa gsum las gzhan sngags pa nyid gang du dad pa'i sa der dkyil 'khor bri ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-25: de la sa gzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba ni zhes pa sbyang ba rnam pa gnyis te phyi dang nang gi'o ;
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-26: / de bas na slob dpon yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-27: zang cing rgya che ba la mos pa dang dmigs pa can no //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-28: de la zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa'i slob dpon gyis ni byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pas phyi'i nyes pa rnams kyi dngos po gzod ma nas ma byung ma skyes par rtogs te nang gi sems sbyangs pas dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir phyi'i zug rdu bsal ba la sogs pa mi dgos mod kyi slob ma rnams kyi yid dang sbyar ba'i phyir phyi'i sa rnams brtag pa yang de rnams la ma zhen par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-29: de bas na slob dpon zab cing rgya che ba la mos pas ni phyi nang gnyis ka'i sa sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-30: dmigs pa can gyi slob dpon gyis ni byang chub kyi sems goms par ma byas pas phyi'i sa rnams sbyang bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-31: de la nang gis sbyang ba ni byang chub kyi sems goms par byed pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:303b-32: phyi'i sa sbyang ba ni rdo dang bong ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-0: gyo mo dang gseg ma med cing zhes pa nas nyes pa thams cad spangs pa'i @304a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-1: gnas ni lha rnams la rab tu shis so zhes pa'i bar du'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-2: de la tshes grangs dang zhes pa nas snga dro'i dus kyi ches ltas bzang pos mtshon pa la zhes pa'i bar du ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa brtag pa tshar nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-3: yongs su gzung ba rtsom pa'i tshes grangs dang skar ma brtag pa la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-4: rgyu skar shis pa ni skar ma 'ba' zhig shis pa la mi bya'i /
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-5: nyi ma dang tshes grangs kun kyang ste shis pa zhes pa so sol sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-6: snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ltas bzang pos mtshon pa la zhes pa ltas bzang po brtags pa rab 'bring rnam pa gsum ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-7: lha'i dang bar snang gi dang sa las byung ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-8: de la lha'i ni nam mkha' las sgra snyan pa la sogs pa 'byung ba ste mchog go //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-9: bar snang gi ni bkra shis pa'i tshig dang bram ze'i rig byed la sogs pa thob pa ste 'bring ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-10: sa las byung ba ni sa la dung la sogs pa 'dug par mthong ba mthong ba ste tha ma'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-11: de ltar thog rtsom pa'i snga dro'i dus na ltas de rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig byung na bzang ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-12: sa yongs su gzung ba la sogs pa'i las rnams brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-13: sa'i lha mo sbran pa'i tshig su bcad pa gnyis bsgrag par bya'o zhes pa ni snga dro'i dus na ltas bzang po dang ldan na dkyil 'khor gang du bri bar bya ba'i sa gzhi der sa'i lha mo la khyod kyi steng du dkyil 'khor bri'i zhes gsol ba btab ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-14: bstod pa'i tshig su bcad pa'i sgo nas so //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-15: sangs rgyas thob pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-16: spyod pa'i tshul gyis khyad par ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-17: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi tshul khyad par du spyad pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-19: de ltar spyad nas byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud rnam pa bzhi bcom ste mngon par sangs rgyas pa yangs khyod kyi steng du yin pas na lha mo khyod kyis ji lta ba bzhin du shes te dbang du gyur to zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-21: spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-22: sa dang pha rol phyin dag la //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-24: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-25: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-27: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:304a-28: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-0: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas sa @304b dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams spyad de /
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-1: byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud rnam pa bzhi btul nas mngon par byang chub par byas pa de bzhin du bdag kyang ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams bsgral ba'i phyir sa khyod kyi steng du dkyil 'khor bri ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-2: rim gyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-3: sa la lag pa reg byas shing //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-4: de ltang lan mang sbran nas ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-5: pus mo gnyis ni der btsugs nas //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-6: me tog spos kyis mchod par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-7: mchod nas sngags pas de nas de //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-8: de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-9: zhes pa sa'i lha mo la tshigs su bcad pas bskul te gsol ba gdab pa la yang sngar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lha mo de la mchod cing phyag byas la lag pa sa la bzhag nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-10: gdod gong du smos pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bskul te gsol ba gdab po /
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-11: de nas cho ga 'di dag gis //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-12: mkhas pas sa gzhi sbyang bar bya ;
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-13: / zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshul gyis sa sbyang bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-14: de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-15: 'di lta'i tshul ni mi shes pas //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-16: yul dang dus dang bya ba las //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-17: dge dang mi dge'i mtshan ma yis ;
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-19: sems dpa' chen po de dag phyir //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-20: cho ga 'di ni brjod pa yin //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-21: zhes pa'i bar ni gong du nyi ma dang tshes grangs dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-22: skar ma la sogs pa'i ltas rnams ni bshad na sngags rnams kyi rang bzhin ni don dam par byang chub kyi sems yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-23: mtshan ma med pa de dag las 'das pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-24: kun rdzob tu yang dkyil 'khor dang sgrub pa dang sngags spyad pa'i yan lag rnams mtshan ma can yin mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-25: don gyi bya ba byed la skar ma dang tshes grangs la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'di rnams ni don dam pa dang yang 'gal la kun rdzob tu yang don gyi bya ba byed ma yin na /
T02TD2663A.1E:304b-26: ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan ma de dag bshad ces gsol ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas don dam pa'i mtshan nyid de lta bu yin mod kyi ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don dam pa'i tshul de mi shes @305a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-1: pas 'gro ba de rnams drang ba'i phyir mtshan ma rnams bshad pa'i rigs pa bstan pa ste //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-2: 'gro ba de rnams kyang rnam pa gnyis te //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-3: dngos po la chags pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-4: dngos po med pa la chags pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-5: dngos po la chags pa rnams la yang tshes grangs dang dus dang yul la sogs pa dngos po dang rjes su mthun par bshad cing drang ba dang dngos po med pa la chags pa rnams kyang de las bzlog ste dngos po'i sgo nas drang ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-6: sangs rgyas mtshan ma mi mnga' ste //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-7: zhes pa ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma mi mnga' ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-8: chos kyi sku la rnam par bzhugs //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-9: zhes pa ni de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma mi mnga' bas dmigs su med pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-11: de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du gyur pa ni chos kyi sku la rnam par bzhugs pa shes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-12: gsang ba ba'i bdag po de la ji skad bstan pa'i gnas gang yang rung bar sa gzhi rab tu 'thas par bcags te zhes nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-13: bdag nyed la na 'di skad du /
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-14: sems can chen po bu khyod legs //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-15: dkyil 'khor myur du bris shig ces //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-16: spro ba bskyed pa mthong yang rung //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-17: zhes pa'i bar zhag bdun gyi sngon rol du snang ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-18: mi snang ba la dkyil 'khor sa blang ste de la snang ba ni rgyal po la sogs pi'i ma rnams so //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-19: mi snang ba ni 'jig rten pa'i lha dang gnod spyin dang sha za la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-20: lha la sogs pa la ma blangs par dkyil 'khor bris na dkyil 'khor gyi lha khro bo la sogs pa'i zer gyis 'jig rten pa'i lha de rnams la gnod par 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-21: de ltar gnod par 'gyur na lha de dag sgrub pa la bgegs kyis skabs 'tshol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-22: gnyis su na de dag la gnod bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris na sgrub pa po snying rje med par 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-23: de bas na de dag gis sbyin pa'i ched du sdar lha la sogs pa rnams sbran zhing sa bslangs na lha la sogs pa de rnams kyang bag byed cing de nas gzhan du 'dong ste nyes pa med par 'gyur la /
T02TD2663A.1E:305a-24: rgyal po la sogs pa mi rnams la yang sngar sa sngar sa blangs na phyis brtsad pa mi 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-0: der sdar bslangs @305b nas phyis dkyil 'khor bri ba las zhag gsum gyi sngon rol du ji skad du smos pa'i sa der ji ltar rigs par brtags nas sa yongs su gzung ba'i rim pa 'di ltar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-1: thog mar ba'i lci bas la ma lhung ba dang ba'i gcin du bsres pas dkyil 'khor bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-2: de nas sa de sngags kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-3: de nas phyogs mtshams kun du bgegs bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-4: de'i 'og tu dri'i dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis pa gru bzhi rnams bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-5: de nas sngags pa 'grengs te dkyil 'khor de'i dbus kyi nam mkha' la sangs rgyas rnams bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-6: de yang rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnams sdud par gyur pa dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya bcings nas bsam mo //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-7: sngags pa 'grengs te sangs rgyas lnga po rnams nam mkha' la bsam pa ni mi gnas pa'i ston pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-8: de nas der dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de sangs rgyas kyi spyan sdar 'phags pa mi g-yo ba 'am /
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-9: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'am /
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-10: gang yang rung ba'i sngags kyis sa de yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-11: des na sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor du gzud pa'i nub mo gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-12: de nas sngags pa de nub phyogs kyi ngos su nyal la byang chub kyi sems dang snying rje dang ldan par bya ste rmi lam blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-13: de yang rab 'bring gsum du shes par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-14: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams mthong ni rmi lam tha ma'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-15: sangs rgyas rnams mthong na 'bring ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-16: sangs rgyas de rnams shin tu dgyes shing sngags pa la bu khyod legs so dkyil 'khor myur du bris shig ces bskul ma 'debs par mthong na rmi lam rab tu shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-17: 'di rnams rgyud nyid kyi nang nas zhib tu 'byung ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-18: rgyud kyi nang na ltag 'og 'khrugs par 'byung bas 'dir las su bya ba'i rim pa bzhin du bkod do //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-19: de nas de yi phyi de'i nyin //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-21: gcig gnyis bzhi las lhag kyang rung ;
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-22: dpyad mi dgos par gzung bar bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-23: shes pa'i bar du slob ma rnams brtag pa ste //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-24: de yang bye brag gi mtshan nyid dang rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang //
T02TD2663A.1E:305b-27: slob ma dang cing rigs btsun pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-0: zhes pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ji skad du @306a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-1: bshad pa rnams ni bye brag gi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-2: rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'og nas 'chad la //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-3: phal pa'i mtshan nyid de sngar ji skad du bshad pa dang grangs su bcad pa gzhan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-4: 'og nas 'on kyang slob dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral bar yi dam bca' ba kho nar bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-5: des byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyur 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir sems can tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-6: slob ma de rnams las kyang rgyud la sogs pa la mkhas shing byang chub kyi sems goms pa ni dkyil 'khor du bcug pa de nyid kyi tshe na de slob dpon nam sgrub par dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-7: rgyud la sogs pa rnams la ni mkhas kyang byang chub kyi sems ma bsgoms na byang chub kyi sems sgom du bcug ste phyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-8: de las gzhan snga nas kyang rgyud mi shes byang chub kyi sems kyang ma bsgoms //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-9: phyis kyang rgyud shes par mi 'gyur la byang chub kyi sems kyang sgom par mi 'gyur ba ni phal pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-10: dus gnyis gar yang dbang mi bskur gyi //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-11: byang chub kyi sa bon du 'gyur ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du gzud do //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-13: slob ma dad cing rigs btsun pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-14: zhes pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang du slob ma'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni bshad zin pas 'dir ma bshad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-15: bcu 'am brgyad dam bdun nam lnga //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-16: gcig gnyis bzhi las lhag kyang rung //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-17: zhes pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma ni shin tu dkon pas grangs nyung ngu gsungs pa yin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-18: lhag kyang rung zhes pa ni mtshan nyid de lta bu dang ldan pa mang ba dkon pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-19: brgya la de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan na de las lhag ste grangs med pa yod na yang nyes ba med do //
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-20: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-21: byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyur gyur par bya ba'i phyir sems can tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes pa'i bar ni gong du slob ma'i grangs nges par gsungs na ci las yin zhes bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:306a-22: de'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-0: slob ma rnams kyi grangs nges par gsungs pa ci las yin @306b zhes dri dgos pa las //
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-1: dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming ci lags ci'i slad du dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi zhes bya ba dris she na /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-2: de'i dgongs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-3: de skad dris na dkyil 'khor gyi nges pa'i tshig dang dmigs su bab bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-4: slob ma'i grangs nges pa gsum char dris par 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-5: de la dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming ci lags zhes pa ni dmigs su bab cing bstan par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor dris pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-6: ci'i slad du dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi zhes pa ni nges pa'i tshig dris pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-7: dkyil 'khor 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste //
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-8: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor 'di sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ba'i phyir te /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-9: sangs rgyas byung na sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi chos rnams kyang 'byung la /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-10: sems can gyi don mdzad pa yang yod do /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-11: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor 'di las kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'byung zhing sems can gyi don bya ba yang yod de /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-12: 'phral du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang rim gyis mchog la sogs pa'i grub pa dang zhib la sogs pa'i las rnams byed pa yod cing /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-13: mthar sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-14: dkyil ni snying po zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-15: 'khor ni rdzogs pa ste zhes pa ni mar gyi snying po'am /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-16: tsandan gyi snying po dang 'dra ste mchog gam dam pa la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-17: mar dang tsandan gyi snying po dag la ni mi chog pa dang ma rdzogs pa yang srid na de dag dang 'dra ba yin nam zhe na //
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-18: snying por 'dra mod kyang de las khyad par du khyab pa zhes gsungs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-19: khyab pa ni chog pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-20: yongs su rdzogs pa'i don to //
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-21: dkyil 'khor 'di'i snying po ni ji ltar chog pa dang rdzogs pa yin zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs med par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags nas stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams yongs su rdzogs te bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa ni snying por gyur pa chog pa dang dam pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:306b-23: chog pa ni de las gzhan pa btsal mi dgos par des chog pas mi 'gyur bar yongs su grub pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-0: gang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa mi 'gyur bar yongs su grub pa de nyid sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis sku la sogs @307a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-1: pa mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi 'khor lor gyur pa ni dkyil 'khor 'dir byin gyis brlabs pas na dkyil 'khor 'di'i snying pos chog pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-2: gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'on kyang dkyil 'khor rgyas pa 'di ni sems can gyi khams ma nges pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba zhes pa la /
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-3: sems can gyi khams ma nges pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir zhes pa ni snying rje chen po'i dbang gis tshad med pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams dkyil 'khor 'dir btsud pa bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur bas yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir zhes gsungs so ;
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-4: / snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes pa na dkyil 'khor 'di snying rje chen po las 'byung ba ste bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas snying rje chen po'i dbang gis sku la sogs pa mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor 'di 'byung bas na snying rje chen po las 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-5: snying po zhes pa ni 'byung khungs te snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di 'byung ba'i gnas so //
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-6: yang na dkyil 'khor 'di las snying rje chen po 'byung ba la yang bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-7: dkyil 'khor 'di'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi chos snying rje chen po la sogs pa 'byung ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-8: dkyil 'khor rgyas pa zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor 'dir btsud pa'i sems can rnams bsod nams rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-9: gnyis su na dkyil 'khor nyid kyi snam bu la sogs pa'i rim pa 'phel ba'am /
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-11: 'on kyang zhes pa ni sangs rgyas 'byung bas dkyil 'khor zhes bya mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-12: 'di rnams dang ldan pa'i phyir ming yang 'di skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-13: der ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa byin gyis brlabs so zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor 'di ni gzhan ma yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:307a-14: gang de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa grangs med par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags nas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa de nyid sngags kyi lta dang phyag rgya dang sngags kyi yi ge rnams su lhag par bkod de byin gyis brlabs so zhes bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-1: de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste zhes sbyar te /
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskal pa grangs med par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes nas sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis sku la sogs pa mi zad pa'i rgyan sems can gyi khams ma lus pa'i phyir byin gyis rlob ste sems can gyi khams gcig gam /
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-3: gnyis kyi phyir ma yin te rnam grangs des na de bzhin gshegs pa gang du 'tshang rgya ba ni sems can gcig gam gnyis kyi phyir ma yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-4: mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi don gyi phyir mngon par 'tshang rgya bar rig par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-5: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can gcig gi phyir byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma yin /
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-7: gsum gyi phyir ma yin gyi 'on kyang thugs rje chen po'i dbang du gyur pa dag sems can gyi khams ma lus pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-8: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos 'chad ces pa ni de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du mngon par sangs rgyas mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-9: ma lus pa'i sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad pa'i snod du mi 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-10: so so'i dad pa dang rjes su mthun par de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'chad pa ni bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos 'chad pa'o zhes so //
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-11: gsang ba pa'i bdag po theg pa chen po la sngon goms par ma byas pa rnams ni gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul mthong ngam thos na sems la dga' ba 'am dad pa cung zad kyang yang dag par mi skye'i /
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-12: gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag gis sngon theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa la goms par byas pa zhes pa la byang chub sems dpa' la'ang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-13: pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang sngags kyi sgor spyad pa spyod pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-14: de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod /
T02TD2663A.1E:307b-15: sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-0: de la yang khyad bar ni gcig ni @308a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-1: sngags gtso bor sgrub cing pha rol tu phyin pa zhar la spyod la /
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-2: gcig ni pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bo bsgrub cing sngags zhar la spyod de /
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-3: de ltar spyod pa gnyis ka yang chen po'i mtshan nyid du gcig ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-4: sems can gang de lta bu'i theg pa chen po la tshe rabs snga ma rnams su thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i sgo nas ma zhugs shing nan tan du ma byas pas ni gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams thos sam /
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-5: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa mthong na yang dad pa dang dga' ba mi skye ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-6: sngags kyi spyod pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dag sngon goms par byas pa ni gnyis ka la yang dad ba skye ste sngags spyod pa la goms par byas pas kyang pha rol phyin pa mthong ngam ma thos na dga' zhing dad pa skye la /
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-7: pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa la goms pas kyang sngags kyi spyod pa mthong ngam thos na dga' zhing dad pa skye'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-8: de bas na gang dag gis theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa la goms par byas pa zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-10: theg pa chen po gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'di lta bu la goms par byas pa ni gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul 'di la dang cing snod du 'gyur gyi gzhan rnams ni ma yin na zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-11: sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa zhes pa ni theg pa chen po de nyid kyi yon tan te /
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-12: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi chos rnams sgrub pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-15: pho nya la sogs pa'i sgo rnam pa mang po sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-16: de dag ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin te zhes pa ni de lta bu'i theg pa chen po la goms par byas pa'i sems can de dag gi sems shin tu brtan te /
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-17: mu stegs dang bdud la sogs pas mi bzlog pas de dag gi sems rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'o//
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-18: de rnams nyid kyi don gyi phyir grangs kyi tshad 'di byas so zhes pa ni de lta bu'i sems can shin tu dkon pas na grangs kyi tshad mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:308a-19: 'on kyang slob dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral bar yi dam bca' ba kho nar bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-0: des byang @308b chub kyi sems kyi rgyur 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir sems can tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes pa ni gong du grangs su bcas pa ni sgrub pa'am slob dpon du smin par bya ba'i slob ma ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-1: de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams la yang snying rje chen po bskyed de dkyil 'khor der btsud na slob dpon nam sgrub pa por mi 'gyur yang dkyil 'khor du btsud cing byang chub tu sems bskyed na byang chub kyi rgyu sa bon du 'gyur ba'i phyir tshad dang grangs tshad med par gzung ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-2: de nas de dag bos la dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gtang bar yang bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-3: sdig pa mi bya ba rnams kyang bsgo bar bya'i zhes pa nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-4: bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi //
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-5: theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-6: tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-7: zhes pa'i bar du dkyil 'khor bri ba'i snga de nub slob ma rnams yongs su gzung ba'i rim pa bshad pa ste de yang rnam pa dgu'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-11: dus gsum gyi sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-12: dri dang me tog sbyin pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-14: skud pas dpung pa bcings te srung ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-16: rmi lam bltar gzhug pa dang chos bshad pa rnams so //
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-17: de rnams kyang rgyud las ni kha cig ltag 'og tu 'byung mod kyi las su bya ba'i rim pa lta bur blta'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-18: de las gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba sbyin pa ston te /
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-19: gsum ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-20: brgya la sngon so sor thar pa la sogs pa'i sdom pa'i skabs su song zin pa yang slar yang 'dir skyabs su gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-21: sngon song ba na dge 'dun 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad la skyabs su song gi 'dir sangs rgyas dang chos la skyabs su song ba snga ma dang mthun du zin kyang dge 'dun la mi mthun te /
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-22: 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bye brag tu skyabs su song ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:308b-23: de las gzhan pa skyabs su ma song ba rnams ni gdong skyabs su gtang bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-0: de ste 'dir sngon skyabs su song zin pa yang brtan par bya ba'i phyir @309a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-1: slar yang 'dir skyabs su gtang bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-2: sdig pa mi bya ba rnams kyang bsgo bar bya'o zhes pa ni sngon chad byas pa'i sdig pa sngar bshags pa dang da ltar mi byad cing phyis mi bya bar khas blang ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-3: de la da ltar mi byed cing phyis mi bya bar khas blang ba ni rigs na sngon byas zin pa slar bshags pa la don ci yod ce na /
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-4: sdig pa sngon byas pa la yon tan du mi blta zhing /
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-5: 'chags na 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe sdig pa byas pa'i dngos po de mngon du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-6: da la sdig pa bshags pa yang gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i sngon rol du bya ste de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-7: sdig pa bshags shing gtsang mar byas pa'i lus can de skyabs su gtang ba'i 'os yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-8: de nas de dag la spos dang me tog la sogs pa spyin no zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-9: dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa gzung zin pa'i 'og tu bya ste de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-10: de la sdig pa bshags shing skyabs su song la sdom pa bzung bas slob ma de snod du gyur cing sbyin pa'i gnas yin pas dri dang me tog sbyin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-11: de dag dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa yang 'dzin du gzhug go zhes pa la dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes te /
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-12: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de ni shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus thams cad du yang dag pa nyid kyi dngos po sgrib pa med cing thogs pa med par mthong bas na dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-13: ye shes de thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-14: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu spong ba'i sdom pa ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-15: dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa zhes bya la sngom pa de yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bye brag gis zhib tu 'og nas 'chad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-16: 'dzin du bcug nas sngags pa yis //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-17: de nas so shing dag kyang sbyin //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-18: rtse gcig mnyam par gzhag pa dag / shar ram byang du kha bstan te //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-19: au du mba ra aa shvattha //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-20: shin tu bzang po bsrung byas shing //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-21: me tog dri la sogs bskus pa'i //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-22: so shing dag ni 'char gzhug go //
T02TD2663A.1E:309a-23: sems can snod rung snod mi rung //
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-0: bor ba nyid @309b las brtag par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-1: zhes pa ni gtsang zhing dag par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-2: 'jig rten pa'i tshul du yang sang lta bu nas smyung bar 'dug par bya na do nub so shing bca' bar srid de /
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-3: de dag dang mthun par bya zhing gzud pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-4: so shing de bor nas kha gang du bltas pa las slob ma rnams grub pa la sogs pa gang gi snod du gyur pa'i ltas blta ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-5: rtse gcig mnyam par gzhag pa dag / shar ram byang du kha bstan te //
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-6: zhes bya ba dag so shing dag ni 'char bzhug [*gzhug?] go //
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-7: sems can snod rung snod mi rung //
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-8: bor ba nyid las brtag par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-9: zhes pa ni kha phyogs su bltas pa las so shing gi kha bdag la bltas par gyur pa grub pa mchog myur du 'thob pa'i snod du yang 'gyur zhing /
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-10: so shing gi kha nub phyogs su bltas pa'i zhar gyis dbang du byas ba'i las kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-11: so shing gi rtse mo shar phyogs su bltas na grub pa mchog dang rgyas pa'i las kyi snod du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-12: so shing gi kha lho phyogs su bltas na mngon par spyod pa'i las grub pa'i snod du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-13: bdag nyid kha byang phyogs su bltas la so shing gi kha bdag la bltas na grub ba 'bring po myur du 'thob pa'i snod du 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-14: so shing gi kha byad phyogs su bltas na zhi ba'i las 'grub par 'gyur la /
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-15: byang shar gyi mtshams su bltas na zhi dang rgyas pa gnyis ka 'grub par 'gyur zhing shar lho'i mtshams su bltas na mngon par spyod pa 'grub la /
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-16: lho nub kyi mtshams su bltas na bskrad pa dang skam pa la sogs pa'i las 'grub cing nub byang gi mtshams su bltas na gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa 'grub po //
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-17: so shing 'og gzhi la zugs te rtse mo bar snang la bltas na bar snang la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur la /
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-18: gyen du bltas na rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa 'grub cing kha thur du bltas nas 'og tu 'gro pa grub pa'i snod du 'gyur te zhib tu ni gsang ba spyi'i rgyud la sogs par blta'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:309b-19: so shing gi ltas blta ba yang bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams la blta bar bya ba yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-0: slob ma phal pa rnams la ni so shing gi las de dag dang ldan du zin kyang grub pa la @310a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-1: sogs pa la de lta bu'i nan tan mi byed pas ltas de rnams ci nas kyang brtag dgos pa ma yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-2: de nas lag pa g-yon pa la //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-3: skud pa mdud pa gsum ldan pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-4: bdag nyid mnyam par gzhag pa yis //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-5: legs pa ru ni bcing bar bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-6: zhes pa ni 'phags pa mi g-yo ba 'am /
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-7: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba gang yang rung ba'i sngags kyis mdud pa re re zhing lan re gdab ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-8: slob ma de rnams bsrung ba'i phyir dpung pa g-yon pa la slob dpon nyid kyis bcing ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-9: de ltar yongs su gzung ldan pa'i //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-10: slob ma nyes pa med rnams la //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-11: bsam pa brtan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-12: 'di ltar spro ba bskyed par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-13: zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas gzengs bstod na slob ma rnams dga' zhing spro bas sems brtan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-14: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-15: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-16: gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-17: bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-18: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-19: yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-20: de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-21: sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-23: de ltar khyed kyis sdig pa bshags shing skyabs su 'gro ba dang sdom pa bzung bas mnyam pa med pa'i rnyed pa bla na med pa'i byang chub de yang rnyed do zhes pa ste de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:310a-24: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pas bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro //
