T02TD2663A.1E:342b-3: bkra shis pa ni lha rnams mchod pa dang mi 'gal ba ste 'dir ni mdo tsam du smos kyi ming gis smos pa las gzhan pa yang yid du 'ong zhing bkra shis pas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-4: tsandan na ta ka ra zhes pa nas //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-6: zhes pa'i bar gyis dri chab kyi mchod pa rnams te yid 'ong zhes pa ni 'dir ming gis smos pa las gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba dri zhim pa'i dri'i rigs rnams gang yang rung ba dbul lo zhes pa ste de rnams las kyang la la ni gcig pu sbyar /
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-7: la la ni bsdus te sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-8: dri'i mchod pa dbul ba'i sngon du yang me tog gi mchod pa rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-9: aa ga ru'am sgron shing ngam //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-11: gzhan yang bdug spos sna tshogs pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-12: bkra shis 'jig rten rnam par grags //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-13: yid 'ong sngags pas cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-14: lha rnams la ni 'bul bar bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-15: zhes pa'i bar gyis bdug pa'i mchod pa rnams bshad de /
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-16: de rnams kyang la la ni gcig pu sbyar /
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-17: la la ni bsdus te sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-18: gzhan yang bdug spos sna tshogs pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-19: bkra shis 'jig rten rnam par grags //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-20: yid 'ong sngags pas cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-21: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-22: zhes pa ni 'dir ming gis smos pa las gzhan yang 'jig rten du grags pa'i bdug pa sna tshogs pa lha rnams mchod pa dang mi 'gal zhing rung ba yang dbul bar bya zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-23: de nas gzhan yang sems dpa' che //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-24: lha bshos las kyi cho ga nyon //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-26: zho dang 'o ma rgyas par dbul //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-27: zhes pa'i bar gyis lha bshos kyi mchod pa rnams bshad pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-28: de rnams kyang zas dang bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba'i dngos por shes par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-29: de la zas ni 'o thug dang 'bras chan la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-30: bza' ba ni la du la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-31: bca' ba ni shing thog la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-32: btung ba ni zho dang 'o ma la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-33: rgyas par zhes pa ni de rnams bzang zhing mang du dbul ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-34: mar me rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:342b-36: rab tu bkang ste dbul bar bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-0: zhes pa'i bar gyis mar me'i mchod pa bshad pa ste @343a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-1: gtsang zhing zhes pa ni nya tshil la sogs pa mi gtsang ba med pa dang ras kyi sdong bu dri ma med pa zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-2: phyogs su gdugs dang ba dan rnams //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-3: kha dog sna tshogs rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-4: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i sgo khar gdugs dkar po gcig gzhag go //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-5: ngos bzhi dang grva bzhi'i phyogs so sor kha dog dang mthun pa'i ba dan rnams nga sgreng bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-6: rta babs bzang po rnams kyang ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-7: dril bu dang bcas rab tu dbul //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-8: zhes pa ni phyi'i sgo khar ni shing la sogs pa las byas pa'i rta babs bzang po dril bu dag gis brgyan pa zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-9: de nas bum pa brgyad dam ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-11: mgrin pa ras kyis bcings pa rnams //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-12: mkhas pas rnam par dgod par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-13: zhes pa'i bar gyis bum pa rnams dbul ba ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-14: nag po la sogs pa'i skyon med cing gzhung las byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa rnams dbul lo //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-15: de rnams gsang ba spyi'i rgyud las 'byung ba bzhin du lha rnams so so la bsngos par mi bya bar spyir dgod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyis btab ste slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i tshe blugs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-16: lha yi gtso bo rnams la ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-17: ras ni zung ra rung re dbul //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-18: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor rim pa gsum char gyi sgo khyud rnams kyi nang na bzhugs pa'i gtso bo rnams dang dbus na bdun pa zhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la ras zung re re dbul lo zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-19: thams cad la zung re mi 'byor na spyir zung gcig dbul bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-20: sems dpa' chen po phal rnams la //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-21: ya re dbul bar rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-22: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha phal pa rnams la ya re re dbul zhes pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-23: thams cad la ya re ma 'byor na spyir ya gcig dbul bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-24: de rnams kyang bum pa'i mgrin pa dkri ba ma gtogs pa'i ras gzhan yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-25: slob ma dkyil 'khor drung bkug ste //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-26: sngags pas chu yi bsang gtong byas //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-28: slob ma sdig dang brla ba kun //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-29: de ltar legs par btsud nas ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:343a-30: zhes pa'i bar gyis slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor du gzung ba'i chog shad de /
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-0: de yang sngar mchod pa'i tshe slob dpon las kyi rdo rje sems @343b dpar bsgyur ba las slob ma dkyil 'khor du 'dzud pa'i tshe 'og nas 'byung ba'i slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin du bsgyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-1: thog ma nyid du dkyil 'khor gyi phyir ra'i sgor slob ma rnams kyi bgegs bsal ba'i phyir khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bum pa'i chus gtor te /
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-2: slob ma rnams kyi gdong g-yogs kyi ras la dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya bcings nas dam tshig gsum gyi sngags lan gsum bzlas pas slob ma'i gdong g-yogs par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-3: de nas slob ma'i lag par dri dang me tog byin la byang chub kyi sems bskyed de /
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-4: de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dang sngags kyis chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis rlob bo /
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-5: de nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang sngags dang rdo rje go cha'i sngags kyis slob ma de rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-6: spyi bor chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge ram kha dog dkar po klad kor dang bcas pa 'bar ba can bsams te /
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-7: de nas dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya bcings nas de'i sngags zlos su bcug la me tog 'dor du gzhug go //
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-8: de nas me tog gang du bab pa'i lha de sngags pas slob ma de la sbyin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-9: de nas dkyil 'khor lan gsum du bskor du gzhug go //
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-10: de rnams ni dkyil 'khor du gzud pa'i cho ga'i rim pa mdor bshad pa'o ;
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-11: / yan lag so sor bshad pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-12: byang chub sems kyang 'dzin du gzhug / ces pa ston pa byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du gzhug pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dran byas nas //
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-14: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes smra bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-15: smon pa byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02TD2663A.1E:343b-16: bdag med 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas bzung ste nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa rang gi sems gdong ma nas ma skyes pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-2: thams cad rab tu bskyed par 'gyur //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-3: zhes pa ni de ltar smon pa byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas sa bon btab pa'i sgo nas rgyal ba'i rigs dge bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-4: rgyal ba'i rigs zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-5: de la shes rab ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-6: thabs ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams te /
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang de las byung bas na de ni rgyal ba'i rigs zhes bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-8: chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-9: phyag rgya de dag rnams la bcing //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-10: zhes pa ni 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang gnas pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-11: chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi sngags dang phyag rgya des slob ma de stong pa nyid du byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-12: chos kyi 'khor lo 'ang bcings nas ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-13: rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-14: ces pa ni de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtogs nas slar kun rdzob kyis go nas sems can rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsgyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni rang gi sems rdo rje dang 'dra bar brtan pa cis kyang zil gyis mi non pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-16: de yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa dbu rgyan dang ldan zhing rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i sku'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-17: de'i snying gar yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-18: de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-19: dam tshig sdom brtson can gyis bcing //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-20: de nas sngags kyi cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-21: ras la lan gsum gdab par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-22: zhes pa ni slob dpon gyis gdong dgab pa'i ras la dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya dang sngags kyis gdab ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-23: de yang skabs 'dir bshad mod kyi las 'di rnams dang por shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-24: de dag gi gdong yang dag pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:344a-25: ces pa ni dam tshig gis btab pa'i ras des slob ma de rnams kyi gdong dag par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-0: gdong dgab pa de yang de dag sngar tha mal gyi mig tu 'dug pa las dam tshig gi sngags dang @344b phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pas bkag nas ye shes kyi mig tu bsgyur bar gyur te ye shes kyi mig de phye nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor de bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-1: snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis su //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-2: zhes pa ni snying rje dang ldan pas bya ba yin gyis de khe dang bkur sti'i phyir ma yin no zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-3: dam tshig lan gsum bzlas nas ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-4: zhes pa ni me tog 'dor du gzhug ces pa dang sbyar te dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya bcings pa sngags kyang lan gsum bzlas te me tog 'dor du gzhug go //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-5: dam tshig gsum zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mi zad pa dang gsung mi zad pa dang thugs mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-6: de'i byin gyi rlabs su gyur pa ni dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-7: phyag rgya bcings shing de'i sngags lan gsum bzlas na sku la sogs pa mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan de mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-8: de bas na sngags pa rtag tu zlos pa la sogs pa byed pa'i tshe yang dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya bcing ba de'i phyir du yin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-9: dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya bcings te sngags lan gsum du bzlas na dam tshig nyams pa la sgos pa slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-10: spyi bor yi ge ra zhes pa /
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-11: klad kyi 'khor bcas brjid dang ldan //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-13: zla ba 'char ka lta bu yi //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-14: kha dog dkar po gzhag par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-15: zhes pa ni slob ma'i spyi bor yi ge ra chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes bsam ste ra ni shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-16: klad kor gzhag pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-17: 'bar ba'i phreng ba dang bcas pa ni rgyu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-18: zla ba 'char ka lta bu ni zla ba 'char ba'i tshe rang bzhin dkar ba la cung zad rtsa dmar bar bstan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-19: dkar ba ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-20: rtsa dmar ba ni sems cang yi don la chags pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-21: skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-22: de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug / me tog gang la bab pa de //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-23: sngags pas de la sbyin par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-24: zhes pa ni sngon dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs shing lha ma mnos pa'am /
T02TD2663A.1E:344b-25: dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing lham mnos sam /
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-0: lha mnos te btang ba rnams gdod lha mnos @345a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-1: par bya na me tog gdod de ltar dor bar bya la /
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-2: de ltar lha mnos zin te gdod nod mi dgos na gdong g-yogs bkrol la me tog de dag gi lha'am bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la bul bar bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-3: de dag kyang zhib tu ni bsdus pa'i don du bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-4: me tog dor nas lha gang la bab pa de'i cha brtag pa yang gsang ba spyi'i rgyud kyi nang du blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-5: dkyil 'khor dang po'i sgo drung du //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-6: sgo khyud kyi ni dbus kyi cha //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-7: dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo gnyis kyi //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-8: bar du slob ma gzung bar bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-9: der gnas pa la cho ga kun //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-10: rim pa bzhin du legs par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-11: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gsum pa'i sgo khyud kyi dbus su slob ma der gzung de der gnas nas gong du smos pa'i las thams cad bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-12: sgo khar slob ma la chus gdab pa 'ba' zhig ma gtogs so //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-13: dkyil 'khor gyi nang du ma zhugs par sgo gnas las de rnams bya ba dang lha rnams la me tog 'dor ba yang sgo nas bor ba na nang du 'bab par 'gyur gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-14: nang du zhugs te bor na lha kha cig rgyab tu las par 'gyur la /
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-15: bdag dbus su zhugs te bor na me tog phyi rol du bab par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-17: skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-18: zhes kyang 'byung bas bdag nang du zhugs nas kha cig gi spyan sngar yang mi 'gyur la /
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kha cig la rgyab kyis blta ba mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-20: gsum du na 'di ni chos kyir gyal po'i 'khor yin pas thog ma nas nang du zhugs na ko long du 'gyur te rgyal chos dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-21: slob ma sdig dang bral ba kun //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-22: de ltar legs par btsun nas ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-23: de dag zhi bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-25: sbyin sreg rjes la sngags pa yis //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-26: zhes pa'i bar gyis dkyil 'khor du btsud pa'i slob ma de dag zhi bar bya ba'i sbyin sreg bya ste slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor du zhugs pas sdig pa rnams byang zhing rgyud dag pa des bcom ldan 'das kyis ku mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan la sogs pa la sbyin sreg gi sgo nas yon phul na bsod nams 'phel te sdig pa 'byang bas zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-27: de'i rim pa yang thog mar snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun rol /
T02TD2663A.1E:345a-28: dkyil 'khor bar ma'i sgo'i phyi rim /
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-0: @345b gsum pa'i nang rol du me thab khru gang ba bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-1: de ste dkyil 'khor chung nas nang du mi shong na dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim gyi sgo gar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-2: khang thog la sogs par brkor mi rung na tshon dmar pos thab bri bar bya la /
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-3: de nas thab de'i tha mar lho phyogs nas brtsams te ku sha g-yas skor du dgras zhing gcig gi rtsa bas gcig gi rtse mo non par byas te bskor ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-4: de nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i dri'i chu gtor la /
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-5: de nas thab der 'jig rten pa'i mi mri ta zhes bya ba las thams cad byed pa mgrin pa ring la spu can kha dog kham par 'dug pa me tog gcig thab der bor la me de byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-6: de nas me lha de la zhal bsil dang gang ba'i sbyin sreg gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin du byin nas de nyid du 'dar ba'i rang bzhin dub zhag la /
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-7: de nas thab der me tog gcig bor nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhi ba'i mer byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-8: zhal bsil dang gang ba'i sbyin sreg la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du byas nas slob ma re re'i phyir yang sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsag cig re slob ma'i lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bon nas slob dpon gyi lag pa g-yon pas bzung ste bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-10: yan lag gi don bshad par bya ste sdig dang bral ba kun zhes pa ni slob ma de rnams dkyil 'khor du gzhug par rtsom pa na gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sgos pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-11: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-12: zhugs nas kyang phyis sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa na sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi dang rjes gsum ga dge ste sdig pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-13: sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin du bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-14: zhes pa ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga gzhung las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du bya ba ste 'og nas 'byung bar blta'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-15: snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-16: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i rgyab rol gyi //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-17: dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-18: ma g-yengs pa yi sems kyis bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-19: me thab khru gang tsam gyi ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-20: tshad du rab tu bsgrags pa yin //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-21: zhes pa ni gong du bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.1E:345b-22: 'dir khru gang pa 'ba' zhig gsungs kyi zlum po'am gru bzhir bya ba ma smos kyang zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i thab ji ltar grags pa la bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-0: skabs 'dir ni zhi ba'i las yin @346a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-2: yang na zhi ba dang rgyas pa gnyis ka'i bzhi mthun na gru bzhi yang nyes pa med do //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-3: kha ran so bzhi'i tshad dub ya //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-4: zhes pa ni thab gru bzhi'i ni kha ran yang gru bzhir bya la /
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-5: thab zlum po la kha ran yang zlum por bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-6: dbus su rdo rje rab tu brtag / ces pa ni ye shes lnga'i phyag rgyar gyur pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa bri'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-7: de nas sngags pa'i g-yas logs su //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-8: sbyin sreg gi nyo byad gzhag / g-yon gyi phyogs su slob ma rnams //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-9: zhes pa ni bsreg par bya ba'i rdzas rnams sngags pa'i g-yas su gzhag go //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-10: g-yon du slob ma bkod pa na slob dpon slob ma'i g-yas su 'bab ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-11: slob dpon des slob ma la phan 'dogs pa dang rjes su mthun par bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-12: tsog tsog por ni 'khod du gzhug / ces pa ni cho ga'i las rnams ma zin gyi bar du bag phag ste mi 'dug pa'am gus pa bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-13: sdom brtson bdag nyid sa steng du //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-14: ku sha bting ba'i stan la 'dug / ces pa ni slob dpon rtsva ku sha steng du 'dug pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-15: yang na tshon rtsi dmar po mchog / ces pa nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-16: nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-17: zhes pa'i bar ni go rims bzhin du gong dub shad zin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-18: yid ni mnyam par bzhag nas su //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-19: zhes pa ni zhi ba'i las la byams pa'i dang tshul bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-20: sbyin sreg rjes la sngags pa yis //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-21: slob ma rnams la yon bslang ba //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-23: sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i dge 'dun la //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-24: ci nus par ni mchod bstod bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-25: zhes pa'i bar ni sdig pa dang bral ba'i slob ma de dag slob dpon gyis bsod nams kyi zhing dam pa la sbyin pa byed du gzhug ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-26: mchog tu phan 'dogs pa'i slob dpon de la slob ma rnams kyis gus par yon phul na bsod nams mchog tu 'gyur ba'i phyir gser dang dngul dang rin po che la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o zhes bskul ma btab bo //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-27: de ltar slob dpon la yon phul nas kyang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun ni sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa yin pas 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la yon 'bul ba dang chos ston gsol bar bya ba yang /
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-28: 'di ni bsod nams zhig yin zhes //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-29: sems can kun gyi dong yi phyir //
T02TD2663A.1E:346a-30: skyob pa rnams ni nan gyis gsungs //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-0: zhes bya ba la sogs @346b pas bstan pa yin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag nar do rje la bka' stsal pa /
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-2: sems dpa' chen po dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-3: sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-4: rgyas pa ru ni bshad par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-5: yid gcig bsdus te legs par nyon //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-7: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-8: khyod la rnam pa kun du srung //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-9: zhes pa'i bar gyis slob ma rnams dbang bskur ba'i skabs 'chad de /
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-10: de la mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid mi zad pa'i rgyan rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa'i spyan sngar rin po che la sogs pa'i bum pas chu blugs pas chu blugs pa ste mngon par blugs zhes pa'i tshig gi don to //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-11: de yang rnam pa gsum du brtag par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-12: dbang bskur ba'i ming ji lta bu yin pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-13: su la dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-15: de la dbang bskur ba'i ming ji lta bu yin pa ni spyir dbang bskur ba'i rnam pa mang ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-16: sngags pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir rig pa sbyin pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-17: las kyi dbang bskur ba ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang mngon spyod kyi las bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-18: gdon bsam pa la sogs pa bya ba'i phyir dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-19: de dag las skabs 'dir ni slob dpon du dbang bskur bag zhes bya ste de ni ming ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-20: su la dbang bskur ba ni slob ma phal pa thams cad la dbang bskur bar bya ba ma yin gyi dam tshig can lnga'i skabs nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-21: dkyil 'khor dang ni phyag rgya mthong //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-22: las dang bya ba la yang sbyar //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-23: zhes sngags kyi rgyud rnams thos shing dkyil 'khor la sogs pa 'dri bar nus pa khyad par can gyi slob ma dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-24: yongs su grub pa'i slob ma rnams la dbang bskur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-25: su la dbang bskur ba zhes pa ni de rnams la dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-26: ci'i phyir dbang bskur zhes pa ni chos kyi mig mi 'tshub par bya ba'i phyir te /
T02TD2663A.1E:346b-27: 'jig rten na yang 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag lung bstan pa dang rtog pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-0: sman la sog pa rnams kyang slob mas rdzogs pa rlobs nas slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'i cho ga 'jig rten pa rnams la ji ltar srid pa bzhin du byas na bshad pa la sogs pa bya bar @347a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-1: slob ma la lung sbyin pa srid do //
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-2: de dag kyang so so'i gtsug lag rdzogs par mi shes shing dbang ma bskur bar bshad pa la sogs pa byas na gtsug lag de dag ji lta ba bzhin du bshad mi nus pas de dag gis mi 'tshub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-3: de bzhin du 'dir yang slob ma rnams rgyud la sogs pa rdzogs par shes par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-4: de dag nyid slob dpon gyi mdo mngon sum du bzlas nas rgyud bshad pa dang dkyil 'khor bri ba la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par slob dpon nyid yid ches te /
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-5: sems can gyi don byed nus par gyur pa rnams la dbang bskur na chos kyi mig mi 'tshub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-6: gnyis su na de ltar mngon par 'dus byas pa'i slob ma de slob dpon du gyur na 'jig rten pa rnams kyang khungs de lta bu las byung ba'i slob dpon de la yid ches shing btsun par byed do //
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-7: rim pa 'di lta bus dbang ma bskur la rgyud la sogs pa mi shes par btsan thabs su sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa 'chad cing dkyil 'khor 'drin ji lta ba nyid du mi shes te /
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-8: don log par 'gyur pas sngags kyi lha la sogs pas kyang byin gyis mi rlob pa'i phyir ci bsams pa'i don mi 'grub la /
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-9: gdul ba'i 'gro ba rnams yid mi ches shing mi phyogs pas chos kyi mig 'tshub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-10: ci'i phyir dbang bskur ba zhes pa ni de'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-11: de la dbang bskur ba yang ji ltar 'jig rten gyi rgyal po dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bka' khrims ston pa /
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-12: mngon par mtho ba'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa de ji ltar rgyal thabs su dbang bskur bar bya ba de bzhin bya ba ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-13: 'dir yang mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i phyir te /
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-14: de yang rim pa 'di ltar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-15: thog mar rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du bar khru dos bcad de der dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor rim pa gcig pa sgo gcig pa bris la /
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-16: de'i nang du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris te /
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-17: dkyil 'khor gyi grva bzhir rdo rje 'dzin pa bri zhing padma'i 'dab ma brgyad po la yang byang chub sems dpa' bzhi dang phyag brnyan bzhi ste brgyad bri'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:347a-18: padma'i dbus su chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge ram bris la der slob ma bzhag ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-0: dri dang me tog la @347b sogs pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-1: bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-2: gleng gzhi rgya chen po snyan pa rnams bsgrags shing kun du bzang po la sogs pa'i sems dpa' rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rin po che bzhi'i bum pa dkyil 'khor chen po lan re bskor nas slob ma de'i spyi bo nas blugs so //
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-3: de'i 'og tu 'dir dngos su ma smos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtug tor dang spyan dang ljags dang go cha rnams kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-4: sngags kyis kyang slob ma de la padma'i steng na 'dug pa nyid nas rim pa bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-5: de nas gnas de bslab ste dkyil 'khor de'i nyi 'khor du dri bzang po gcig bzhag ste gos gsar pa brjes nas gos gsar pa phrugs cig gon nas khri'i steng du bzhag go //
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-6: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod nas /
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-7: slob dpon nyid mig dbye ba'i thur ma thogs nas mdun du 'dug ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bu khyod kyis mi shes pa'i rab rib rnams bsal to zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig brjod do //
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-9: de nas me long thogs la chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar rang bzhin med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi tshul du sgoms shig ces pa'i tshig brjod do //
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-10: de nas de ltar bdag gi don yongs su rdzogs nas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir rkang pa'i 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo bzhag ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-11: chos kyi 'khor lo skor cig ces bsgrag go / de nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi gsung mchog 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags par bskor bar bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-12: gsung mchog de'i phyag rgyar gyur pa dung bzang po cig lag pa g-yas par byin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-13: khyod kyi chos kyi dung bus shig / ces brjod do //
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-14: de ltar sems can gyi don byas nas sangs rgyas rnams la byas pa gzo ba la sogs pa'i tshig de'i 'og tu brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-15: de rnams ni las su bya ba'i rim pa bsdus te bshad pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-16: yan lag gi don bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-17: sems dpa' chan po dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-18: rgyas pa ru ni bshad par byas //
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-19: yid gcig bsdus te legs par nyon //
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-20: zhes pa la dbang bskur ba'i tshig gi don gong du bshad zin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:347b-21: rgyas pa ru ni bshad par byas //
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-0: zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba'i cho ga @348a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-1: 'og nas 'byung ba rnams dang ldan par 'chad pas shes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-2: sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis bshad ces pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas bya ba gcig du bstan pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-3: gsang ba'i pa'i bdag po slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du bar khru do bor nas phyi rol gyi sa la dkyil 'khor gnyis pa gru bzhi la sgo gcig pa bri bar bya'i zhes pa la don gzhan ni sngar bshad zin te /
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-4: 'dir dngos su ma smos kyang spyi'i mtshan nyid ltar byas na nang gi dkyil 'khor gyis shar phyogs su gzhol na dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor byang phyogs su bri bar bya /
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-5: nang gi dkyil 'khor byang phyogs su gzhol na dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor nub phyogs su bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-6: 'dir ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor bri ba mtha' gcig tu gsungs pas nang gi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba'i tshu mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi sa byang phyogs su gzhol bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-7: 'on te shar phyogs su gzhol na yang bar sa rgal gyis bcad par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-8: grva bzhir rdo rje 'dzin sngar bzhin dgod de zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-9: rdo rje 'dzin pa de rnams dang 'og nas byang chub sems dpa' bzhi dang phyag brnyan bzhi 'byung ba rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan las gyur pa ste de rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir spros pa med par gnas pa zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-10: nam mkha' dri ma med pa ni stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul nam mkha' dang 'dra ba ste shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma spangs pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-11: dri ma med pa'i mig ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'am /
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-12: shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i shes rab can zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-13: gos sna tshogs gyon pa ni ngo tshab sgrib par byed pas gos te /
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-14: gang zhig ngo tsha ba yod na mi byed pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-15: bya ba'i rigs pa rnams byed pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-16: dam pa rnams kyis bsngags pa ste de lta bu'i ngo tsha dang ldan pa zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-17: dbus su padma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas pa gzhag pa ste zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-18: ye shes brgyad kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348a-19: ze ba ni yon tan rnams so //
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-0: 'dab ma bzhi la byang chub sems dpa' grogs su gyur pa sngon @348b gyi smon lam gyi mthu can du gyur pa bzhi bri bar bya ste zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-1: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan las gyur pa ste gnyis ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa /
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-2: gnyis ni gzhan gyi don du phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin te smon lam gyi dbang gis chos kyi rgyal por dbang skur ba de'i padma'i gdan gyi gnas su gyur pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-3: de la gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes pa la gzungs ni shes rab ste de'i rgyal por gyur pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-4: dran pa dang shes bzhin can ni shes rab de nyid mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin sems can rnams la rgyun mi 'chad do //
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-5: phan pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa can rnams la phan par sems pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-6: snying rje can ni snying rje'i dpang gis sems can rnams la phan par sems pa ste de gnyis ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-7: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-8: snga ma gnyis ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-9: 'dab ma gzhan rnams la ni phyag brgyan bzhi bris te zhes pa yang de bzhin nyid yon tan du shes par bya ste smon lam gyi dbang gis gyur pa ni gong ma bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-10: sems can gyi khyad par la spyod pa ni gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-11: 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-12: sems can rnams kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par shes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-13: ma chags pa dang rnam par grol ba zhes pa ni 'bras bu'i yon tan te stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni chags pa med pa yin la chags pa med pas na rnam par grol ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-14: gong ma gnyis ni rgyu'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-15: dbus su ni chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs gzhag go zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-16: chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge ra kha dog dkar po padma'i snying po la gzhag go //
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-17: rin po che'i bum pa bzhi zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-21: ma ra ka ti'i bum pa gser dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-22: dbul la sogs pa de dag gis brgyan pa'i bum pa bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:348b-24: de rnams kyi kha dog dang mthun pa'i sa'i bum pa bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-0: de dag la sogs pa'i yo byad rnams @349a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-1: 'byor bzhin du ji skad du 'byung ba bzhin ma sbyar na /
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-2: 'jungs pa'i sems dang ldan te sems ma dag pas lha rnams kyang byin gyis mi rlob ces gzhung las 'byung ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-3: snying nas med kyang mi 'byor du mi rung snyam nas mi spobs te mi byed dam ;
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-5: nad kyi rkyen sman gyi zong yang mi 'jog par byed na /
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-6: yang dgongs pa'am cho ga mi shes pa yin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-8: nad kyi rkyen sman gyi zong du snyad btags nas lhag par yod pa gtong mi phod na gong du smos pa dang 'dra ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-9: mdor na sems la sgyu med pa'i gtsang spra shes par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-10: kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bun gyis brlabs pa yang slob ma de ngan song spang bar bstan pa'i phyir thog ma nyid du ngan song thams cad spong ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyis btab pa'i bum pas bkru'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-11: ngan song spangs nas shes bya dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-12: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur cig pa'i don du /
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-13: de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i sngags kyis btab la bkru'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-14: de nas kun du bzang po'i sa thob par gyur cig pa'i don du kun du bzang po'i sngags kyis btab pa'i bum pas bkru'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-15: de nas chos kyi rgyal tshab tu gyur cig pa'i don du byams pa'i sngags kyis btab pa'i bum pas bkru'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-16: padma dam pa de la ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-17: sngags pa dag gis de bzhag nas //
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-19: spos dang me tog bzang po yis //
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-20: de la yang ni mchod par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-21: zhes pa'i bar du don gzhan ni gong du bshad zin la /
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-22: slob ma de dbang bskur bar bya ba'i tshe /
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-23: 'dir dngos su ma gsungs kyang dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe na rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsgyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-24: de las gzhan pa'i skur bsgyur ba ma gsungs pas rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsgyur te dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349a-25: dbang bskur ba'i tshe padma'i gdan la bzhag pa yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'dug thabs su bzhag ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-0: rkang pa g-yon pa khri'i steng du bzhag la g-yas pa sa la @349b gzhag cing /
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-1: lag pa g-yon pa khri la brten la /
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-2: g-yas pa pus mo la bzhag ste gdong yang mi mtho mi dma' bar drang por blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-3: de nas gser gyi thur ma ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-5: ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-6: zhes pa'i bar du rim pa gzhan ni gong du bshad la //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-7: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-8: ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-10: sngon thos pa dang bsams pa'i shes rab kyis rgyud la sogs pa mi shes pa rgyal ba'i lung slob dpon gyis bshad pas mi shes pa bsal to zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-11: sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-12: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba bzhin //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-15: de ltar mig gi sman pa'i rgyal pos 'jig rten pa rnams kyi mig gi rab rib bsal te gzugs la sogs pa'i rang dngos ji lta ba nyid du 'dug pa mi mthong ba las mthong bar byas pa bzhin du /
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-16: rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang bu khyod kyi ma rig pa chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug pa mi shes pa las shes par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-17: de nas me long blangs nas su //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-18: chos kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-19: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-23: sye mched la sogs pa'i chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-24: bltar yang snang la yang dag par brtags na dngos po yod pa ma yin pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-26: 'di ltar phung po la sogs pa'i chos rnams phung po'i rang bzhin du dmigs su med pas dang ba zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-28: shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-29: rnyog pa med pa'i sgrib pa dang de dag gi bag chags kyang med ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-30: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-32: de lta bu'i stong pa'i rang bzhin la rnam par shes pa drug gis gzung du med cing tshig gis brjod pa las 'das pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:349b-33: rgyu dang las las byung ba ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-1: po la sogs pa'i chos rnams rang bzhin gyis yod pa'i rang bzhin ma yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-2: rgyu dang las las byung ba sna gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-3: yod pa ma yin pas brjod du med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gong ma rnams dang sbyar ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-4: ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-5: de ltar chos 'di shes nas su //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-7: gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bas rang bzhin med pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-8: rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas skad cig ma'i char mi gnas par shes pas te /
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-9: chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid de ltar shes nas de lta bu'i tshul du sgom pa'i shes rab kyis sgoms shig ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-10: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-12: chos kyi dung ba ni bla med pa //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-14: de ltar bdag gi don phun sum tshogs nas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par byos shig ces pa ste gong du bshad zin to //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-15: sangs rgyas sras su skye zhes pa ni /
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-16: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes las skyes so zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-17: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-18: dog pa med pa'i sems kyis khyod //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-20: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing sems can gyi don bya ba de ltar yin nam ma yin snyam pa'i the tshom dang yid gnyis mi skye ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-21: 'khor rnams la bag tshab med par 'jig rten pa rnams la gsang sngags sprad pa'i tshul gyi chos rab tu sgrogs shig ces pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-22: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-23: phan thogs byas pa gzo zhes bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-25: de ltar sems can gyi don byas na sangs rgyas rnams kyi bya ba byas pas byas pa dran zhing sangs rgyas la lan ldon par bshad do zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-26: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-27: khyod la rnam pa kun du srung ;
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-29: dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor grva bzhir rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhi bkod pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:350a-30: padma'i 'dab ma la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyang las byas pa don yod do snyam nas srung bar byed do zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-0: de nas slob ma de @350b bslangs la //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-1: sngags pa snying rjer gyur pa yi //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-3: shin tu nges pa yid kyis ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-4: de dag thams cad khas blang ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-5: zhes pa'i bar gyis slob ma la dam tshig bstan pa ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-6: de yang sngon dam tshig mnos pa dang ma mnos pa gnyis ka la bstan no //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-7: de la slob dpon dam tshig bzhi dang lnga dag tu ldan la /
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-8: las dang bya ba dag sbyar ba rgyud la sogs pa dang dam tshig shes shing mnos zin pa la bstan ci dgos she na /
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-9: 'jig rten na rgyal por nams kyang rgyal chos su bya ba rnams snga nas kyang shes shing srung mod kyi ;
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-10: nam rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i tshe na /
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-11: yang slob dpon la sogs pas bstan zhing gsol bar byed do //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-12: de bzhin du 'dir yang snga nas kyang dam tshig 'di rnams srung mod kyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-13: chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i chos kyis bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-14: gnyis su na yang dang yang du bstan na brtan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-15: de nas slob ma de bslangs la //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-16: sngags pa snying rjer gyur pa yi //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-17: yid kyis nang du bcug nas ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-18: de la dam tshig bstan par bya //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-20: me long dang 'khor lo la sogs pa bstan pa'i gnas de nas slob ma de bslang ste slob dpon gyis slob ma'i gdugs bzung nas dkyil 'khor dang po'i sgo khyud kyi nang du khyud kyi nang der bzhag nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i dam tshig rnams bstan par bya zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-21: de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis ;
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-22: / dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-23: srog gi phyir yang da phyin chad //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-24: yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-26: dam pa'i chos btang ba yang rnam pa gsum gyis 'gyur te /
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-27: theg pa chen po las log par lta ba dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-28: chos smra ba la mngon du dbang za zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:350b-29: nyin re zhing dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-0: mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las gang yang rung ba zhig ma byas na @351a * //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-1: dam pa'i chos gtad pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-2: de rnams khyod kyis srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-3: de nas gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems gtang bar mi bya'o zhes sbyar te /
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-4: byang chub kyi sems rnam pa bzhi las sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir bdag sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces pa'i smon lam gyi sems dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtag tu bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i 'jug pa'i sems mi gtong ba la bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-5: khyod kyis ser sna mi bya'o zhes sbyar te chos dang nor bdag la bdog cing gzhan la byin par rigs pa las mi sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-6: gang sems can la gnod pa mi bya'o zhes te /
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-9: yid gsum gyi sgo nas sems can rnams la 'phral gyi gnod pa dang yun gyi gnod pa mi bya zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-10: slob mas bla ma'i rkang pa la //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-11: dad cing gus par phyag byas nas //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-12: shin tu nges pa'i yid kyi ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-13: de dag thams cad khas blang ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-15: gong du slob dpon gyis dam tshig bsgo ba de rnams lus dang /
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-17: yid gsum gyi sgo nas sgyu med par khas blang ngo zhes pa ste lus kyis /
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-18: slob mas bla ma'i rkang pa la //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-19: dad cing gus par phyag byas nas //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-22: de dag thams cad khas blang ngo //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-23: zhes pa ste bkal stsal pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smra bar bya'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-25: shin tu nges pa'i yid kyis ni //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-26: zhes pa ste slob dpon gyi ngo tsam khas blang ba ma yin gyi /
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-27: sems thag pa nas so zhes pa'o //
T02TD2663A.1E:351a-28: de yan chad kyis snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnams rdzogs so /
